font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The only constant on\nthe planet is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static--\neverything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a cosmic dance of\nopposite forces , which sustains this universe. &nbsp;&nbsp;No life\nis possible on earth without this dance, mediated by the middle prong of Shiva\u2019s\ntrident.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a perfect tango\nof dynamic balance where one polar opposite changes into another smoothly and\nconstantly . &nbsp;If the restraining balance\nor equilibrium is lost , the universe will spiral out of control and end. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lessening of Yin-\nalways results in increase of Yang and vice versa. One cannot exist without the\nother and they are dependant . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No phenomenon in this\nuniverse is completely devoid of its opposite. &nbsp;They consume each other yet support each\nother. Whatever is in excess gets reduces, whatever is deficient gets\nreplenished. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balance can never be\npermanent\u2014 Ying and Yang continuously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om is the king mantra\nof Hinduism. &nbsp;&nbsp;It has a numerical representation of 108, the reason\nwhy all Hindu rudraksha malas contain 108 beads.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sri Yantra geometry was\nused in the construction of the Egyptian pyramids, whose architects were\nMaharishis from India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A tablet containing\nthis sanskrit verse from Bhagawat Gita of 4000 BC was found in the great\nPyramid. It is now in the British Museum. \u201cvasanvsi jeernani yatha vihaya,\nnavani ghrunnati naro parani\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means \"as a\nperson puts on new garment, giving up the old ones, the soul similarly accepts\na new material body giving up the old and the useless ones\". &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This explains the\nritual of the mummy making and the elaborate burial system in the Egyptian\ncivilization where efforts are made to make the soul comfortable with all\nnecessary things because they believed that the soul will need all these till\nit finds a material body. Reincarnation in short.&nbsp; This is a Hindu Vedic concept.\u2014nobody else\ncan claim this Sanskrit verse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The great pyramid of\nCheops Egypt has a base angle 51 deg 49 minutes like the 11000 year old Sri\nYantra geometry large pyramid, showing exactly the same relationship between pi\nand phi . The ratio of the hypotenuse to half the base is phi, the Golden\nRatio-- or 'divine proportion', given by (1 + square-root 5)/2 (its value to\nfive decimal places is 1.61803). It is a sure indication that the Pharaoh's\narchitects were NOT from Egypt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most difficult part\nis that all 54 triple intersections meet at the same point. &nbsp;It requires a great deal of intelligence\u2014 to\ndraw this on 2D. &nbsp;&nbsp;The Sri Yantra is a union of Shiva and Shakti\n( male /female &nbsp;or opposites ) &nbsp;&nbsp;. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the number 54 pans\nout to 108, the divine Hindu number of OM- in sync with the rhythms of time and\nspace and represents perfect totality. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\"<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM\nis this imperishable Word. &nbsp;&nbsp;OM is the\nuniverse, and this is the exposition OM. &nbsp;The past, present and the future, all that\nwas, all that is, all that will be is OM. &nbsp;Likewise all else that may exist &nbsp;beyond the bounds of time, that, too, is\nOM.\"</span></i></span> &nbsp;( <b>Verse 1- Mandulya Upanishad 5000 BC</b> )<o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mutts are Jyothir\nMutt at Badrinath in northern India with Atharva Veda; Sarada Mutt at Sringeri\nin southern India with Yajur Veda; &nbsp;Govardhan\nMutt at Jaganath Puri in eastern India with Rig Veda and Kalika Mutt at Dwarka\nin western India with Sama Veda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malayalam alphabet\nconsists of 54 letters, 18 of which are vowels. It is a syllabic alphabet in\nwhich all consonants have an inherent vowel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me let out a\nsecret. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many people wonder if\ntheir Kundalinis are indeed rising . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If it rises through the\ncorrect Sushumna Nadi &nbsp;certain sounds are\nheard as the awakened kundalini rises up through the chakras:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>at muladhara - the\nchirping of a cricket<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>at svadhisthana - the\ntinkling of an anklet<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>at manipura- the sound\nof a bell<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>at anahata - the music\nof a flute</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GStJFhwNfzI/U1va474mFpI/AAAAAAAAro0/UI0QLRPjegI/s1600/imagddddes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The damaru drum has a\nhour glass construction. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a damaru is\nvibrated, it produces dissimilar sounds which are fused together by resonance\nto create one sound. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern science calls\nthis BINAURAL beats\u2014 just lifted immorally from ancient vedic knowledge penned down\n7000 years ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sound thus produced\nsymbolizes Nada, the cosmic sound of AUM of 7.83 hertz &nbsp;which can be heard during deep meditation. &nbsp;&nbsp;According\nto Hindu scriptures, Nada is the source of creation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human range is on\naverage from 20 to 20,000 Hz. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If 300 Hz is played in\none ear and 306 hz is played in the other ear via stereo headphones the\nbinaural frequency will be </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">6 hertz </b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7.83 Hz This is Schumann\u2019s resonance frequency\nor earth\u2019s heart beat or frequency of Hindu king mantra OM frequency - a sound\nwhich cannot be heard by the ears( unless it is a harmonic ) but can be heard\nby the heart. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Frequencies of the\nbrain are below 40 hertz. &nbsp; Binaural beats\nin the theta (4 to 8 Hz) range have been associated with meditation and\nshamanic states of consciousness. Theta increases creativity, enhances\nlearning, reduces stress, and awakens intuition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This third tone, of </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">6\nHz</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">, the binaural beat, is below the range of human hearing, the only way the\nbrain can acknowledge this tone is if both hemispheres of the brain are\nconnected. &nbsp;The act of listening to this\nwavering stimulates the two halves of the brain to connect.&nbsp; This effect on the brain is called hemispheric\nsynchronization.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both the hemispheres of the brain connect and begin working together\nin order to recognize this difference between the two sounds. &nbsp;Magnetic resonance imaging results of the\nbrain in this state of synchronized hemispheres show a huge increase in the activation\nof areas in both sides of the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I must digress-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Even today the west\nhave NOT yet understood Vedic metaphysics. &nbsp;Metaphysics&nbsp;\nmeans \u201cwhat comes after physics\u201d.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Its object is to\ndetermine the real nature of things\u2014to determine the meaning, structure, and\nprinciples of whatever is insofar as it is-- with reality as a whole. It is a\ncall to recognize the existence and overwhelming importance of a set of higher\nrealities that ordinary men could not deduce. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Metaphysics is the\nscience of ultimate reality , as opposed to appearance or the contrast between\nappearance and reality . A cloud appears to consist of some white, fleecy\nsubstance, although in reality it is a concentration of drops of water. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>A metaphysician is a\nsort of super scientist, unlimited in his curiosity and gifted with a capacity\nfor putting together other people's findings with a skill and imagination that\nnone of them individually commands.&nbsp; He\ncan refute by debate, through a method for systematic evaluation of\ndefinitions.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Orpheus is the founder\nof a sect, called the 'Orphics'. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A man\nno less than Herodotus wrote that &nbsp;the\nmysteries of the Orphics were brought to Europe from India. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Greek philosopher Pythagoras was a member\nof the Orphic sect and that he why he came to Kerala by ship. Herodotus had\nclearly written that Orpheus who would play divine string music and tame wild\nanimals came from India. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Um1evgkWGhw/U10ZK_hy6MI/AAAAAAAArqQ/xXbVgHv6aVI/s1600/Orpheus-2fmxdkjy77x.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">Almost every Greek text tells that Orpheos was famous for Ahimsa or non-violence .</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SjFsw5eXc5s/U10ZW-6uvXI/AAAAAAAArqY/Nz7pix928mU/s1600/imay5egrtes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SjFsw5eXc5s/U10ZW-6uvXI/AAAAAAAArqY/Nz7pix928mU/s1600/imay5egrtes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Orpheus , a\nstrict Hindu vegetarian introduced spirituality to Greece . I</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">n Euripides' play Hippolytos a father taunts his son with the \"lifeless food\" ( vegetarian food ) he eats since taking Orpheos for his \"king.\"</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The original sitar\nhas seven strings&nbsp; which run over curved,\nraised frets, and the remainder are sympathetic strings (tarb,&nbsp; taarif , tarafdaar) which run underneath the\nfrets and resonate in sympathy with the played strings.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qF1RCRFjxFo/U10Z168KwaI/AAAAAAAArqg/nNOxP-C5BaQ/s1600/sitar_bridnrrrr4jktge.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was Orpheus who gave\nPythagoras&nbsp; the mathematical relations of\nthe notes on the musical scale.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost every Greek text tells that Orpheos was\nfamous for Ahimsa or non-violence . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Orpheus is praised for his knowledge of medicine and\nastrology ( ONLY Ayurveda and Indian astrology existed those days). &nbsp;All Greek\nastrology is though Orpheus. Cicero called Orpheus , the tawny hued , a devotee\nof Bacchus ( Krishna ) crowned with kissos ( Tulsi).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Western historians and the\nPope blurred&nbsp; Jesus and Orpheus , and\npretty soon it was Jesus who was attributed to all the qualities of Orpheus \u2013\nenchanting wild animals with a 7 stringed lyre. Orpheus was a Brahmachari , a celibate\nsage.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The Greeks spliced on\nthe FAKE story of Eurydice to Orpheus, based on the MIRRORED version of ancient\nHindu myth of <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Savitri and Satyavan</b>. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>This is about the efforts of Orpheus to retrieve\nhis wife, Eurydice, (who was killed by a serpent on their wedding night ) from\nthe underworld. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ApXpWj6rSNo/U2XnykWfmTI/AAAAAAAAr-o/YcU_9P-h2NM/s1600/savitri_satyavssaaan.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Orpheus went down to\nHades to claim her, and played so sweetly with his lute that Pluto allowed\nEurydice to return to the earth with Orpheus, but on condition that he did not\nlook behind him until he had reached the terrestrial regions. Orpheus, however,\nin his anxiety to see if she were following him, looked round, and Eurydice disappeared\nfrom his sight, instantly and forever.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>This LOOKING BACK story is mirrored from\nthe lore of Adi Shankaracharya bringing Devi to Kerala in 2000 BC \u2014 &nbsp;he looked back and Devi disappeared at the\nspot of Mookambika temple at Kollur Karnataka.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch INTO Google Search-\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of my readers just\nasked me why BJP is weak in Kerala. &nbsp;The answer\nis that there are too many Hindus who have converted to Islam, Christianity and\nsoulless Rothschild Communism.&nbsp; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The world\u2019s second\nchurch , mosque and synagogue was situated in Kodungallur. &nbsp;The synagogue was destroyed by the Portuguese\nCatholic &nbsp;bigots and shifted to Kochi. &nbsp;The church and mosque are still there.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Koran was edited at\nKodungallur Cheraman Perumal Masjid, as Muhammad was a Namboodiri.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kodungallur St\nThomas church is far senior to even Vatican ( Peter ). &nbsp;&nbsp;Let NOT the white Christian man claim superiority.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;The original Christians converted in\nKerala by St Thomas ( called Syrian Christians ) were Jews. These Jewish\nconverts were &nbsp;called Nazranis bythe\nlocals. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were Jews &nbsp;who ran away from Roman persecution , and NOT\nHindu Namboodiris, &nbsp;who held all 4 aces in\nthe game of life. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mother of Jewish King\nSolomon, Bath Sheba was a Namboodiri woman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 721 BC during the\nAssyrian invasion of Jerusalem, Jews came to Calicut for refuge.&nbsp;&nbsp; In 587 BC when Nebuchadnazzer destroyed King\nSolomon\u2019s temple after a two year siege, and hundreds of Jews landed up for\nrefuge.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;In 72 AD ,when&nbsp;\nRoman emperor Titus persecuted Jews and 10000 Jews landed at Calicut,\nand St Thomas was alive to receive them . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 135 AD- Bar Kokhba was\nkilled by Roman emperor Hadrian, over circumcision , &nbsp;and hundreds of Jews landed at Calicut, to\navoid extermination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When St Thomas died in\n72 AD in Kerala ( Tamils contest this as Mylapore ), the word CHRISTIAN had NOT\nbeen formed at Antioch by martyred Ignatius.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;The seat of the patriarchate was\nformerly Antioch, which is now in Turkey.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-W6CQgD44J8A/U13OHRPxZEI/AAAAAAAArqw/ZSp4xtyR0UA/s1600/dowkylnlvoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 15th century, it was moved to\nSyria in response to the Ottoman invasion. The Roman Catholic Church also\nclaimed the patriarchate and appointed titular Latin rite patriarchs for many\ncenturies until it renounced those claims in 1964, for good.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antioch was the capital\nof Syria before Christ was born.&nbsp; Antioch\nwas a chief center of early Christianity. The city had a large population of\nNamboodiri descendants and Hindus in a Jewish origin in a quarter called the\nKerateion.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When St Thomas was\nalive&nbsp; the followers of Christ were known\nas Nazranis, a name that continues to be used in Kerala. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The origin of the term\n\"Christian\" is given in Acts 11:25-26 as follows:&nbsp;&nbsp; <i>Then departed Barnabas to Tarsus, for to\nseek Saul, and when he had found him, he brought him unto Antioch. And it came\nto pass, that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church, and\ntaught much people. And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch. </i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An atom is pure energy held together by a intelligent force.&nbsp; The conscious intelligent field lies in the\nempty space in between the electrons. &nbsp;99.9999%\nof every atom is empty space.&nbsp; What we\nperceive as physical dense matter is actually 99.99 % empty space - large\nelectron fields with very little matter in the center.&nbsp; We live in a universe created of\n\"objects\" that are actually 99.99% space.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; They suddenly appear in another orbit of higher or lower\nenergy or distance from the nucleus.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">Water\nmolecule is H2O.&nbsp; In other words, 2 atoms\nof Hydrogen and 1 atom of Oxygen.&nbsp; Two\ngases combine to make a liquid.&nbsp; It is\nnot a material difference:&nbsp; the protons\nare still protons, the electrons still electrons.&nbsp; When an electron is&nbsp; made to rise up to another shell or orbit and\nsome energy was needed for this shift upwards to be done \u2013 this energy is the brahmAn.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The immoral white\ninvader , after injecting our ancient scriptures in poison, gave the relevant information\nto some of their sponsored heroes , who did NOT know Sanskrit and would take more\n10 life times to master the 4 Vedas and 108 Upanishads.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">CNN IBN POLL GREATEST\nINDIAN SINCE &nbsp;GANDHI VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">HINDUISM IN BALI, TURN\nOF TIDE AND HINDU RESURGENCE VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wh6gKM3RAzU/U15ZH6NgZuI/AAAAAAAAru4/v2Y_ePqNe2I/s1600/imaggyyes+(3).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wh6gKM3RAzU/U15ZH6NgZuI/AAAAAAAAru4/v2Y_ePqNe2I/s1600/imaggyyes+(3).jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cOm\nityetadaksharam idam sarvam, tasyopavyakhyanam bhutam bhavat bhavishyaditi sarvam\nomkara eva.\u201d-</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> &nbsp;<b>Mandukya &nbsp;Upanishad -5000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe Imperishable is\nOM, and it is 'all this'. &nbsp;&nbsp;All this,\nwhatever is visible, whatever is cognisable, whatever can come within the\npurview of sense-perception, inference or verbal testimony, whatever can be\ncomprehended under the single term, creation all this is OM.\u201d&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/-1_Int5836s/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/-1_Int5836s&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/-1_Int5836s&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA cosmic creative vibration (called sphota or explosion)\narises between Shiva and Shakti called Nada. This Nada then gets consolidated\ninto Shabda Brahman (differentiated sound energy), the universal cosmic\nresonance, symbolized by OM. &nbsp;&nbsp;From this arises cosmic intelligence that is\nresponsible for the creation. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe Taithiriya Upanishad says that \"with OM, Brahma\nbegins creation.\"&nbsp;&nbsp; It means the\nwhole creation comes out of sound.<o:p></o:p><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/GCUg4Kx_CjY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/GCUg4Kx_CjY&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/GCUg4Kx_CjY&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe cosmos is vibrant with a mystic melody comprising\nplanetary chimes as well as the plaintive song of atoms, unknown to us and\nunheard by us.<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/iXGOdbFFLCc/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/iXGOdbFFLCc&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/iXGOdbFFLCc&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAnd unheard by us is even\nthe strident crescendo of the universal orchestration in which galaxies, stars\nand planets whirl around perpetually in spirals, cycles, whorls and vortices\ncausing incessant resonance, &nbsp;was &nbsp;the incessant boom of the damaru of Lord Shiva\nduring his frenzied tandav or cosmic dance. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7P_UBR1amqc/U16lz0aclyI/AAAAAAAArwE/ngZSj0Hi7wI/s1600/spiral+galfraxy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"388\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7P_UBR1amqc/U16lz0aclyI/AAAAAAAArwE/ngZSj0Hi7wI/s1600/spiral+galfraxy.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis unheard, dynamic vibrato is recognized in the Vedas as\nthe sound-vehicle of the power of Brahman permeating the cosmos as the forces\nof creation and destruction. &nbsp;It is called\nthe Shabda Brahman, that is the Ultimate Reality in its aspect of sound. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHowever, the unheard cosmic sounds, the symphony of\nShabda-Brahman, was heard by the 12 stranded Vedic Maharishis in their spiritual\ntrances and is enshrined in the Upanishads as the syllable. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOM is the quintessence, the seed-syllable of the universe. &nbsp;Mantra is the sound-body of consciousness. &nbsp;&nbsp;Our 7000 year old Vedas say that matter is\ncreated from vibrations.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe Yoga Shiksha Upanishad says: \u201cThat indestructible\ntranscendent vibrating sound is Shabda-Brahman.\u201d<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNada yoga &nbsp;is an\nancient Indian metaphysical system which is based on the premise that the\nentire cosmos and all that exists in the cosmos, including human beings,\nconsists of sound vibrations, called nada. &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lGMuvmltT3w/U16lYchen-I/AAAAAAAArv8/fwOOG-HFbhE/s1600/Onde_compression_impulsion_1d_30_petit.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"302\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lGMuvmltT3w/U16lYchen-I/AAAAAAAArv8/fwOOG-HFbhE/s1600/Onde_compression_impulsion_1d_30_petit.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis concept holds that it is the sound energy\nin motion rather than of matter and particles which form the building blocks of\nthe cosmos.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_DS1x-Zmylg/U16lO9Y6CSI/AAAAAAAArv0/c0E6ZcgmaN4/s1600/Ondes_compression_2d_20_petit.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"302\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_DS1x-Zmylg/U16lO9Y6CSI/AAAAAAAArv0/c0E6ZcgmaN4/s1600/Ondes_compression_2d_20_petit.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe longitudinal sound wave or scalar wave creates.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9INncaUcf0A/U16lH7xScjI/AAAAAAAArvs/eewLl49gsc0/s1600/imaghhtues.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"237\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9INncaUcf0A/U16lH7xScjI/AAAAAAAArvs/eewLl49gsc0/s1600/imaghhtues.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matter is created by\nvibrations. &nbsp;On a macro scale everything\nis longitudinal sound.&nbsp;&nbsp; On a micro scale\nevery disease is musical disharmony. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Primal sound is &nbsp;referred to as Shabda Brahman - \"God as\nword\". &nbsp;Closely related to this is the concept of Nada Brahman - \"God\nas sound\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just in case you wonder\nwhat is SHABDA and what is NADA \u2013 the former is masculine connoting artha (\nmeaning ) while the latter is feminine signifying the voiced sound .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Music is\nNada.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fundamental structure of the\nuniverse is based on Nada or sound vibrations.</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nA m<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">antra in its purest form , the\ninner power , is a manifestation of Nada.</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The movement of prana ( energy ) &nbsp;in the body is an expression of Nada.</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nada is the celestial music within\nus.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nword Nada is derived from the Sanskrit root nad, meaning \u201cunion through sound.\u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, Nada refers to the\nvibrations which make up the sound. &nbsp;Shabda\nrefers to a discreet sound, separate from the meaning it conveys.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nada Yogi &nbsp;sees the whole macrocosmic\nand microcosmic world as made up of sound.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nada Yogi\nexperiences the macrocosmic universe as a projection of sound vibrations; the\nwhole world as having developed from sound alone.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HQa56kCFckE/U1813ujy-tI/AAAAAAAArxc/RNlj76P9V2U/s1600/graha-notes-a-critical-study-of-sangita-makaranda-199623444-1.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"282\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HQa56kCFckE/U1813ujy-tI/AAAAAAAArxc/RNlj76P9V2U/s1600/graha-notes-a-critical-study-of-sangita-makaranda-199623444-1.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nada means not only\nsound, but energy, flow and pitch. &nbsp;Thus&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Nada Yoga, </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">in a deeper sense is the science of vibration. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum physics agrees with\nour 7000 year old Vedas that vibration (sound) is the essence of all forms in\nthe creation. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound vibration brings\ninto being the visual world of forms.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WZ3UdLVlklg/U181lFTYbII/AAAAAAAArxU/CGCJxmJsgOw/s1600/G-Scale11.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pandit Omkarnath\nThakur, was a Nada yogi , a super sound engineer , a great Indian classical &nbsp;musician . &nbsp;In 1933, while on a European tour , Adolf Hitler\ndirected him to Benito Mussolini, who was unable to sleep for many days due to\nstress. &nbsp;Thakur performed the Raga Puriya\n, a hexatonic raga and put Mussolini to deep REM sleep within a few minutes.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/3rshCvL7erE/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/3rshCvL7erE&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/3rshCvL7erE&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like I said before, when\na damaru is beaten, it produces dissimilar sounds which are fused together by\nresonance to create one sound. &nbsp;&nbsp;According to our Vedas , Nada is the source of\ncreation.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
