, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ship tank cleaning process\nto remove white Kaolin clay sediments is very long. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So we had a Scandinavian supercargo who has a\nbrain wave \u2014 &nbsp;save time by cleaning tanks\nduring clay discharge as the clay slurry tanks emptied out. &nbsp;The cleaned white coloured fresh water would\nbe taken to the nearest beach , by trucks , where he dug out two large pits using a\nbulldozer .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I had warned him that this wont work, as clay colloids with\nimmediately fill up all the sand grain spaces and kill percolation-- in seconds . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But then you see he\nwanted to prove that he is right \u2013&nbsp; it was\nmore of a show of &nbsp;Viking syndrome -- See\nI am head and shoulders above the rest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both huge sand pits\nheld the water \u2013 and ultimately he gave up , after trying for hours to poke holes\nhere and there with long crow bars .The water inside those sand pits would\nremain there till the sun evaporated it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the pit is covered it is as good as\nhaving water in a huge syntax tank we use in our homes to store water \u2013 for ever\n. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pushkar lake is in the middle of the sandy\nThar desert. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If lake water has to be contained\u2014 the underwater bottom and sides\nmust have a clay lining. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind you even now, they\ncan revive the lake \u2013if done in an intelligent manner . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL THEY HAVE TO DO IS\nTO DIG OUT THE LAKE AS PER SPECS \u2014 PUMP CLAY SLURRY ON THE SIDES AND BOTTOM &nbsp;&nbsp;AND\nFILL UP THE LAKE ARTIFICIALLY USING BORE WELLS &nbsp;. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF WATER IS NOT AVAILABLE , THE CLAY JOB CAN BE\nDONE , RIGHT AT THE BEGINNING OF THE RAINS -- JUST PUMP CLAY SLURRY INTO THE LAKE WATER . . .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY READERS FROM RAJASTHAN MUST SHOW THIS POST TO THE CHIEF MINISTER.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"<i>Pushkaradhipati\nTirthani Gangadhayasaritasthata</i>\" means that among spots of pilgrimage Lake\nPushkar occupies the highest place , as verily as sacred river Ganga occupies\nthe place among rivers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The significance of Pushkar has been mentioned both in the\nRamayana and Mahabharata.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are 400 temples\nin Pushkar and the most important amongst them are dedicated to Lord Lord Brahma, Goddess Savitri and Varaha avatar. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lake, elliptical in shape, is\nencircled by 52 ghats . The important ghats are Varaha Ghat and Brahma Ghat . The\nVarah Ghat is the most popular because it is believed that Lord Vishnu once\nappeared here in the form of a varaha (boar).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into google search-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">VISHNU AVATAR VARAHA\nBOAR , &nbsp;TILTING THE EARTH AT AN AXIS OF\n23.4 DEGREES VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is on this ghat that the crowds\ngather on the eve of Kartik Purnima to pay homage to the lake. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our scriptures a\ndemon called Vajra Nabha, living in Pushkar, had killed the children of Brahma\nand in revenge Brahma killed him with a lotus stalk.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-57w0NVD2f4M/UzQBpjmhoVI/AAAAAAAAq1g/9SKEdOpdk7I/s1600/b9.jfrwgwpg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"425\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-57w0NVD2f4M/UzQBpjmhoVI/AAAAAAAAq1g/9SKEdOpdk7I/s1600/b9.jfrwgwpg.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To commemorate this joyous\nevent, devotees for thousands of years , &nbsp;set afloat large leaves bearing little delicate\nclay lamps surrounded by fresh flowers. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uRZRAjjiBIc/UzQBi9UwnxI/AAAAAAAAq1Y/1hEtDF0zDA4/s1600/lawvwsdmp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"254\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uRZRAjjiBIc/UzQBi9UwnxI/AAAAAAAAq1Y/1hEtDF0zDA4/s1600/lawvwsdmp.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later modern\nrationalists and environmentalists banned this age old practice quoting\nsuperstition, thus depriving the lake of its precious input of bottom and side\nclay lining . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is where the\nproblems began.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Desilting removed the\nimpervious underwater clay lining ( built over thousand of years by clay\noffered by devotees ) resulting in heavy percolation and &nbsp;seepage losses --and now the lake can never hold water ..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By mechanical churning\nyou are basically doing DEagglomeration or DEflocculation. &nbsp;&nbsp;The clay will NOT get sedimented because the\ncolloids are stabilized by static electricity. &nbsp;&nbsp;All the\nparticles have a mutual repulsion , and thus the dispersion remains stable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you put egg whites\nand vegetable oil and beat them in a mixer, you get mayonnaise\u2014 it remains so\nbecause of electric charges, which keep colloids apart. &nbsp;In milk factories they all milk power and use\na homogenizer to thicken the milk ( without telling anybody PSSSST ) &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When colloids combine\nthey flocculate to form clumps and settle down. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cavitation nozzles ,\nwhere the imploding air bubbles will create 2000 bars of homogenization effect\nlies in my vision for the future .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1tIXysNtnyA/UzPkGuljiQI/AAAAAAAAq1I/sacrlv88tew/s1600/fetchu6u.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1tIXysNtnyA/UzPkGuljiQI/AAAAAAAAq1I/sacrlv88tew/s1600/fetchu6u.png\" width=\"247\" /></b></span></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>First do a small\nexperiment on your sandy beach or a sand pit.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Take a lump of\nclay.&nbsp;&nbsp; Put it in a bucket and churn it\nup into a <span style=\"color: red;\">COLLOIDAL SLURRY</span> using a mechanical mixer or homogeniser.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Uue9E2IMx90/UzQIdDptGyI/AAAAAAAAq2Q/o7NodXPl2IA/s1600/ColloidalStavdavbility.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"196\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Uue9E2IMx90/UzQIdDptGyI/AAAAAAAAq2Q/o7NodXPl2IA/s1600/ColloidalStavdavbility.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Now dig a hole in the\nsand enough to hold 10 litres . Pour the clay slurry in .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>See for yourself .&nbsp; Once the percolation has stopped scoop out\nthe stagnant muddy water in the hole. Now pour clean water.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>See, you have a small\nlake for yourself. The water will remain there .<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>In the case of Pushkar\nlake they have to identify the underwater fresh water springs.&nbsp; Just leave those areas clear.&nbsp; Those water spring ingress areas will be WET\nin the dry lake . <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Water charging of lake\ncan be done in the rainy season by building up ground water level all around\nthe lake, it is so simple. <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">I will describe that in\ngreater detail , as the post gets longer.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_kmfsEW2wlc/UzQDKBVKJwI/AAAAAAAAq1s/CFB7d1s6NjE/s1600/ganj5kiesha.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"332\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_kmfsEW2wlc/UzQDKBVKJwI/AAAAAAAAq1s/CFB7d1s6NjE/s1600/ganj5kiesha.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">If you do NOT want to\nremove the muddy water and introduce clean water (as you do NOT have water to\nwaste )--&nbsp; all you have to do is to add\nsome alum to cause agglomeration and sedimentation--the opposite effect of homogenisation . &nbsp;All the clay colloids will clump together ( flocculation\n) and sink to the bottom giving crystal clear water.</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uOgF46ay3rQ/UzuU6pb6IHI/AAAAAAAAq5w/hCJTr4ore5k/s1600/pott87er-8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Ganapati Visarjan was\nbanned in Pushkar lake to prevent water pollution by rationalists .&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ashapura has extensive\nreserves of both types of Sodium &amp; Calcium based bentonite in Kutch,\nGujarat, India\u2014and we export it from Mundra port at throw away prices.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Multani\nmitti ( fuller\u2019s earth ) clay has unlimited uses as per our 6000 year Ayurveda.\n&nbsp;The white man has now patented all this, &nbsp;and the name itself is patented to Fort Benton, America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS COLLOIDAL CLAY WILL NOW PLAY A MAJOR ROLE IN LINING THE BOTTOMS OF RAINWATER HARVESTING PITS AND GARBAGE LANDFILLS.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7KyGxEg6Qlw/Uz22pVj9dtI/AAAAAAAAq68/6l56u5Kl1OM/s1600/Tilak08.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ABOVE: &nbsp;BENTONITE CLAY IS CALLED MULTANI MITTI (FULLERS CLAY IN INDIA )</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yh46wKSR8uU/Uz25esWlX8I/AAAAAAAAq7Q/FM-ZGvjR_W0/s1600/Himalaya+Herbals+-Clarifying+Mud+-Pack.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aelius Galenus ( Galen\nof Pergamon) , son of a wealthy Greek Nicon came to Kerala via Egypt at the age\nof 19, after the death of his father . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4PLXTdVqtt4/Uz49Y_fJEWI/AAAAAAAAq7g/bb54byHHTRk/s1600/galffen.0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4PLXTdVqtt4/Uz49Y_fJEWI/AAAAAAAAq7g/bb54byHHTRk/s1600/galffen.0.jpg\" width=\"247\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He visited the\nAlexandria library containing books on 6000 year old Ayurveda , and he was\nfamiliar with the works of Hippocrates, whose grandfather had Ayurvedic texts (\ngiven by Pythagoras who studied in India) . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Galen studied botany, anatomy\nand surgery of Sustruta . &nbsp;Study of human\nanatomy using cadavers was baned in Greece.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Galen took back with\nhim, knowledge of edible medicinal clay, which has a strong negative electrical\nattraction , aggressively searching for &nbsp;positively charged toxic particles &nbsp;-- a &nbsp;magnet\nfor free radicals and toxic heavy metals.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lGirzijxjCc/Uz4-Wa1TRiI/AAAAAAAAq7w/hsIqw0jeyDk/s1600/how-antioxidants-fight-fgfxtywree-radicals.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lGirzijxjCc/Uz4-Wa1TRiI/AAAAAAAAq7w/hsIqw0jeyDk/s1600/how-antioxidants-fight-fgfxtywree-radicals.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">But let me tell you that\nGanapati idols are to me made of Bentonite clay with biodegradable decorations, and organic paints , using NIL non-biodegradable plastic . &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--YTOWkT7PZI/UzQDkDWI8bI/AAAAAAAAq10/oiguuTqBEXc/s1600/ganpati-ganesh-visarjan-chaturthiheth-2012-2013-2014-2015.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"461\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--YTOWkT7PZI/UzQDkDWI8bI/AAAAAAAAq10/oiguuTqBEXc/s1600/ganpati-ganesh-visarjan-chaturthiheth-2012-2013-2014-2015.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: This BENTONITE clay from the idol gives\nthe lake life&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-rXBAI4O8x0k/UzsEUodWdWI/AAAAAAAAq5Q/Ckm7wgWaezE/s1600/phoslock-crBREHoss-section.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"420\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-rXBAI4O8x0k/UzsEUodWdWI/AAAAAAAAq5Q/Ckm7wgWaezE/s1600/phoslock-crBREHoss-section.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">This is NOT a superstition, by any stretch of our imagination.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oPCPrWd0MhE/UzQEem2ztkI/AAAAAAAAq2E/_x2p1uQD2Gg/s1600/1314958258-brisk-sales-of-ganesh-chaturtturjnedhi-handmade-clay-statues-increases_814297.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oPCPrWd0MhE/UzQEem2ztkI/AAAAAAAAq2E/_x2p1uQD2Gg/s1600/1314958258-brisk-sales-of-ganesh-chaturtturjnedhi-handmade-clay-statues-increases_814297.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">This annual surcharge\nof good quality clay is so very important for sustaining the lake level and\nalso the quality of the water.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>A colloid is a very\nsmall, finely divided solids (particles that do not dissolve) that remain\ndispersed in a liquid for a long time due to their small size and electrical\ncharge. These particles have negligible settling velocity because their small\nmass has a low gravitational force compared to surface frictional forces.&nbsp; The particles of a colloid selectively absorb\nions and acquire an electric charge. All of the particles of a given colloid\ntake on the same charge (either positive or negative) and thus are repelled by\none another.&nbsp; Negatively charged\nparticles repel each other due to electricity.&nbsp;\nMost particles dissolved in water have a negative charge, so they tend\nto repel each other.&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The purpose of most\ncoagulant chemicals is to neutralize the negative charges on the turbidity\nparticles to prevent those particles from repelling each other.&nbsp; The amount of coagulant which should be added\nto the water will depend on the zeta potential , a measurement of the magnitude\nof electrical charge surrounding the colloidal particles.&nbsp; You can think of the zeta potential as the\namount of repulsive force which keeps the particles in the water.&nbsp; If the zeta potential is large, then more\ncoagulants will be needed.&nbsp; &nbsp;Coagulants tend to be positively charged.&nbsp; Due to their positive charge, they are\nattracted to the negative particles in the water.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The combination of positive\nand negative charge results in a neutral , or lack, of charge.&nbsp; As a result, the particles no longer repel\neach other. Neutrally charged particles attract due to van der Waal's forces . Once\nthe particles in water are not repelling each other, van der Waal's forces make\nthe particles drift toward each other and join together into a group.&nbsp; When enough particles have joined together,\nthey become floc and will settle out of the water. </i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modified bentonite clay\u2014Phoslock-\nis applied to the water surface as a granule or a slurry to bond with free\nreactive phosphorus. &nbsp;The lanthanum\nadsorbs phosphate molecules to form a mineral called rhabdophane, which is quite\nstable. &nbsp;Any unreacted lanthanum remains\nimbedded in the bentonite granules, which settle to the bottom of the pond,\nthat will continue to bond and sequester phosphorus as it releases from the\nsediments.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Phoslock is the\ncommercial name for a bentonite clay in which the sodium and/or calcium ions\nare exchanged for lanthanum. &nbsp;The\naddition of this element allows it to bind with phosphates to form rhabdophane\n(LaPO4.nH2O) and thereby remove them from the water column. &nbsp;&nbsp;It is used in lake restoration projects as a\ntool to manage eutrophication and manage algal blooms (specifically\ncyanobacteria or blue green algae) by reducing phosphorus, one of the major\ncontributing factors to algal growth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bentonite is an\nabsorbent aluminium phyllosilicate, essentially impure clay consisting mostly\nof montmorillonite.&nbsp; Sodium bentonite\nexpands when wet, absorbing as much as several times its dry mass in water.&nbsp; Because of its excellent colloidal\nproperties,it acts as a sealant, since it provides a self-sealing, low\npermeability barrier. It is used to line the base of garbage landfills.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LANDFILLS BOTTOM MUST\nBE LINED WITH KAOLIN OR BENTONITE CLAY TO PREVENT TOXIC SEEPAGE TO GROUND WATER\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The property of\nswelling on contact with water makes sodium bentonite useful as a sealant,\nsince it provides a self-sealing, low permeability barrier. It is used to line\nthe base of landfills to prevent migration of leachate, for quarantining metal\npollutants of groundwater, and for the sealing of subsurface disposal systems\nfor spent nuclear fuel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sodium bentonite is\nmost commonly used for large castings that use dry molds.&nbsp;&nbsp; The ionic surface of bentonite has a useful\nproperty in making a sticky coating on sand grains. &nbsp;When a small proportion of finely ground\nbentonite clay is added to hard sand and wetted, the clay binds the sand\nparticles into a moldable aggregate known as green sand used for making molds\nin sand casting. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bentonite slurry walls\nare used in construction, where the slurry wall is a trench filled with a thick\ncolloidal mixture of Bentonite and water.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n&nbsp;A trench that would collapse due\nto the hydraulic pressure in the surrounding soil does not collapse as the\nslurry balances the hydraulic pressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ashapura is India\u2019s\nlargest and one of the top five players in BentoniteAshapura Minechem is the\nflagship company of the Ashapura Group and well known as India\u2019s largest mine\nowner &amp; exporter of bentonite. &nbsp;&nbsp;It\nis among the top five global producers of bentonite with over 60 million tons\nof quality sodium aand calcium bentonite reserves across&nbsp; India. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bentonite clay (also called fuller's clay/\nMultani mitti ) are the most useful of all clays and is a precious resource\nwhich must NOT be squandered away in exports.. &nbsp;As per 6000 year old Ayurveda , it has absorbing properties and can be used as\nan exfoliant as it draws out impurities from the skin .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below : Naga Sadhus at Kumbh Mela - dressed only in Multani mitti.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dMl8-q5Nvss/U0DygCBXQGI/AAAAAAAArEs/kGaLxo3kR68/s1600/AFPGetty-51ffe6870213.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The multiple properties\nof bentonite namely hydration, swelling, water absorption, viscosity,\nthixotropy make it a multi-application product for diverse industries.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Primarily two varieties of bentonite are\navailable - sodium bentonite (high swelling, gelling and thermal durability)\nand calcium bentonite (more commonly available worldwide but with less\nswelling).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If there is fish in the\nlake, it is food for them which will help them to become healthy and fat. &nbsp;An oil like coconut oil will help them to\nimprove their nutrition value for humans . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do I hear someone ,\nsome ignoramus, crying that oil pollutes water? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sorry, I have been a\nCaptain at sea for 30 years . &nbsp;All\ninternational and local laws prohibit mineral oils ( Annex 1 oils\u2014kerosene,\ndiesel, petrol etc ) &nbsp;from being\ndischarged into the water.&nbsp; &nbsp;Vegetable oil is Annex 2 oil and there are NO\nsuch restrictions .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; NO THERE IS NO TYPO ( 10% ) . </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even if the clay\nGanesha idol is immersed in the sea , the clay lining along the coast. prevents\nSALT WATER ingress inland when the fresh water ground table level is low in hot\nsummer season. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LovAlXsalIU/UzTjOH_lPZI/AAAAAAAAq28/RG9L4fImiGs/s1600/image_leafeyuid.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
