, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was stone stepped and\nconverted into a bathing pool for the palace women by the Calicut King Zamorin\nMana Vikrama, in the 13<sup>th</sup> century.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--xjsCWTUZtQ/Uz8Q6y4CwGI/AAAAAAAAq8I/kCRMu0ZwY5o/s1600/mananchfvhira.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"408\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--xjsCWTUZtQ/Uz8Q6y4CwGI/AAAAAAAAq8I/kCRMu0ZwY5o/s1600/mananchfvhira.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today this lake provided drinking\nwater to Calicut and the water is clear and blue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QzmI1PMNfQU/Uz8RE7nv-vI/AAAAAAAAq8Q/1xJS0VVGCvQ/s1600/794px-Maanaanchira.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"482\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QzmI1PMNfQU/Uz8RE7nv-vI/AAAAAAAAq8Q/1xJS0VVGCvQ/s1600/794px-Maanaanchira.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What has this thriving lake\nplumb in the heart of the city , NOT been run over by green algae and water\nhyacinths as is usual in almost all dying &nbsp;lakes and temple ponds of India ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">One thing is that we\nhave taken care of the phosphates which ingress the lake. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the past 4 years detergent\nmultinationals have been selling phosphate free laundry detergents in USA and\nwestern countries. But hey, they do NOT care to do the same in India though we\npay the same money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example in\nBangalore all the lakes have poor water quality and looks green due to heavy &nbsp;algae growth. &nbsp;Every house has a washing machine using\nphosphate detergents. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Algae prevent light\nreaching through the water and use up oxygen, causing a decline in the health\nof the water environment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Phosphate is added to\nlaundry detergents to soften the water and to hold dirt in the wash water. &nbsp;There are many alternatives &nbsp;to phosphate , like zeolite, which is\nenvironmentally friendly and does not contribute to nutrient pollution.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Phosphorus is a common\nconstituent of agricultural fertilizers, manure used in gardens , lawns and golf\ncourses. &nbsp;Phosphorus also exists in animal feces--say-- too many stray dogs .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Phosphorus tends to\nattach to soil particles and, thus, moves into surface-water bodies from\nrunoff. It can can also migrate with ground-water flows.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Phosphorus is an\nessential element for plant life, but when there is too much of it in water, it\ncan speed up eutrophication (a reduction in dissolved oxygen in water bodies\ncaused by an increase of mineral and organic nutrients) of lakes. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Phosphate is does not degrade naturally in\nsurface water, except with the use of water treatments .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GceiqL58grM/U0Pu0eN0TJI/AAAAAAAArN8/rZN53_JekT0/s1600/HWDDDV1886P96973.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GceiqL58grM/U0Pu0eN0TJI/AAAAAAAArN8/rZN53_JekT0/s1600/HWDDDV1886P96973.jpg\" width=\"422\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the algae dies, it\nconsequently consumes oxygen in the water, depleting the resource for other\nmarine life.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">India must aim to be have\nphosphate free laundry detergents by 2016. &nbsp;Heavy fines must be slapped for\nnon-complaince, especially on Zionist fortune 500 multinationals who sell phosphate\nfree detergents in western countries , but NOT in India..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deoxygenation of water,\nespecially after collapse of algal blooms, usually result in fish kills.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Loss of recreational use of water due to\nslime, weed infestation, and noxious odour from decaying algae. Dense weeds can\nalso aggravate mosquito and other insect problems. Low suspended algae can\nproduce low infiltration rates because they are filtered out on the basin\nbottom, where they clog the soil. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A big segment of the\nslum dwellers do NOT have proper toilet facilities. Yet we gave 10 billion\nEuros to Italy \u2013nay\u2014Euro zone as charity so that they can drink premium wines.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sewage effluent can\ncontain 5 to 50 mg/l phosphorus, depending on diet and water use of the local\npopulation. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-08ilK_4WWoo/Uz8WK73AuII/AAAAAAAAq8g/zFXQHiyDwsQ/s1600/downlog43wgad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"479\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-08ilK_4WWoo/Uz8WK73AuII/AAAAAAAAq8g/zFXQHiyDwsQ/s1600/downlog43wgad.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In calcareous soils and\nat alkaline pH, phosphate precipitates with calcium to form calcium phosphate.\nIn acid soils, phosphate reacts with iron and aluminium oxides in the soil to\nform insoluble compounds.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes, phosphate is initially immobilized by\nadsorption to the soil and then slowly reverts to insoluble forms, allowing\nmore adsorption of mobile phosphate, etc. In clean sands with about neutral pH,\nphosphate can be relatively mobile.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eutrofication is a\nprocess by which a water body acquires a high concentration of nutrients and\nphosphates, which in turn, promote excessive algae growth, which depletes the\noxygen content of the water, killing off organisms such as fish.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mesotrophic lakes have\nmoderate levels of nutrients and algae.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Supertrophic lakes are\nfertile and saturated in phosphorus and nitrogen, often associated with poor water\nclarity. Excessive phytoplankton growth can occur in ideal conditions - when\nthere's a calm, hot and sunny period of a few weeks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypertrophic lakes are excessively\nenriched with nutrients and are subject to devastating algal blooms. &nbsp;Lakes typically reach this condition due to\nhuman activities, such as heavy use of fertilizers in the lake catchment area.\nSuch lakes are of little use to humans and have a poor ecosystem due to\ndecreased dissolved oxygen. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypertrophic\nlakes are highly fertile and supersaturated in phosphorus and nitrogen. They\nhave excessive phytoplankton growth which contributes to poor water clarity,\npoor suitability for recreational uses, and restricts the habitat for desirable\nfish. &nbsp;Hypertrophic lakes tend to be\nshallow and suffer from high rates of nutrient loadings from point and\nnon-point sources<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How do we measure the\ntrophic state?&nbsp; Levels of oxygen provide\nan indirect measure of lake trophic status.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To determine the\nbiological productivity i.e., the water quality of a lake, four parameters need\nto be measured: total nitrogen, total phosphorus, clarity and chlorophyll .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chlorophyll a\nconcentration is used to give an indirect measure of algal concentrations. Chlorophyll\na is the pigment present in plants that makes them appear green and allows them\nto obtain energy from the sun (photosynthesis).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These parameters reflect the dynamics of the annual lake cycle. Combined they\nform the Trophic Level Index (TLI). The higher the TLI, the lower the water\nquality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High levels of nitrogen\nand phosphorus in the water most often come from agricultural runoff and urban detergent laden waste&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">water.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human-induced\neutrophication cause increased rooted aquatic plant growth (stimulated by the\nincreased supply of nutrients as well as the creation of additional shallow\ngrowing areas due to the accumulation of sediments, silt and organic matter),\nand low dissolved oxygen concentrations in all or parts of the lake .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is as a\nresult of increased plant respiration and the decomposition of organic matter\nby bacteria and other microorganisms. This lack of oxygen can kill fish and\nother aquatic life.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WXYXfTJmSpE/Uz-SducSiBI/AAAAAAAAq-k/_zFwIQBQ3og/s1600/nitrogenrehfcycle.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"414\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WXYXfTJmSpE/Uz-SducSiBI/AAAAAAAAq-k/_zFwIQBQ3og/s1600/nitrogenrehfcycle.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Groundwater is being\npolluted mainly by nitrates. Nitrates come off urea used in lawn fertilisers.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrogen levels in\nsewage be more than 100 mg/l, depending on in-house water use\nand diet of the local people. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Raw sewage has\nconsiderable organic nitrogen.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is\na great</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">need for preventing nitrate\npollution of groundwater in the irrigated area due to excess nitrogen\napplication ( artificial fertilisers ) to the crops.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrogen in commercial\nfertilizer is particularly soluble to facilitate uptake by crops, but this also\nmakes it vulnerable to run-off after heavy rainfall, and to leaching to\ngroundwater.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrogen is an\nimportant factor in causing eutrophication (oxygen depletion) of water bodies</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EyzNaTCfdEs/Uz-k-jBXyVI/AAAAAAAArAM/5b4YT3RLuBA/s1600/8512052161B4ACADCBC8964jrj2A76C.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EyzNaTCfdEs/Uz-k-jBXyVI/AAAAAAAArAM/5b4YT3RLuBA/s1600/8512052161B4ACADCBC8964jrj2A76C.jpg\" width=\"332\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrogen makes up about\n78% of the atmosphere. When heated to the temperatures found in steam boilers\nand internal combustion engines, it can combine with oxygen from the atmosphere\nto form nitrogen oxide and nitrogen dioxide (NOx). &nbsp;NOx is the sum of nitrogen oxide and nitrogen\ndioxide in a given parcel of air. These can dissolve in water, forming weak\nsolutions of nitric and nitrous acids. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lightning\nis the most common natural source of NOx. Overloads of nitrogen can wash\ndownstream to feed algae that monopolize oxygen when they decay, creating\nfish-fatal \u201cdead zones \u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: Weed cutter can be trawled by a boat.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/nuEbqy7DEfA/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/nuEbqy7DEfA&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/nuEbqy7DEfA&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water hyacinth, most of\nthe time is considered to be a weed that is responsible for choking lakes to\ndeath. It is an aquatic plant that grows on the surface of the water body, with\nthe shoot system above the water level and the roots developing in the water.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FFVelUPv5uw/Uz8bhj_9XYI/AAAAAAAAq84/d67rzkp-FmA/s1600/water_hyacinth_farm_pond_phlants1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FFVelUPv5uw/Uz8bhj_9XYI/AAAAAAAAq84/d67rzkp-FmA/s1600/water_hyacinth_farm_pond_phlants1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shoot system covers the surface of the water body to capture sunlight\nthereby obstructing the entry of the sunlight into the water, which is required\nby the algae and other organisms in the water. This leads to a reduction in the\ngrowth of algal population. The roots affect the free movement of the aquatic\nfauna in the water.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water hyacinth grows\nprofusely in presence of nutrients that are mainly responsible for its growth.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-m-E0MCLwYho/Uz8bTkeYDNI/AAAAAAAAq8w/VgEZm7P3UvY/s1600/Kerafewla006.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"394\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-m-E0MCLwYho/Uz8bTkeYDNI/AAAAAAAAq8w/VgEZm7P3UvY/s1600/Kerafewla006.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<o:p></o:p><br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A WORD OF CAUTION - If\nall the water hyacinth ( because it is a menace ) were removed it would cause\nan increase in the amount of nutrients resulting in algal blooms, which are\nalready affecting the lake.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">W<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ater\nhyacinth in a small portion of the lake , is a god given natural aquatic\ntreatment system to uptake HEAVY METALS.</span> &nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">90 % of the metal ( like toxic nickel\n) was absorbed in the root system and 10 % in the root and shoot system. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UN3hl88WNBs/U0I72fZJtBI/AAAAAAAArJU/agmzpDBsO68/s1600/lotus_lguuake.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UN3hl88WNBs/U0I72fZJtBI/AAAAAAAArJU/agmzpDBsO68/s1600/lotus_lguuake.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lotuses ( India\u2019s\nnational flower ) are good for the lake , as they do NOT run over and swamp the\nwaters like water hyacinths.</span> &nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through\nphotosynthesis, aquatic plants convert inorganic material to organic matter and\noxygenate the water too. &nbsp;A lake with lotuses is a healthy lake.</span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lGeTB0tBgc8/U0I7_tAxLCI/AAAAAAAArJc/omFHCjwRBFg/s1600/IMG_9jgvdx828.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"371\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lGeTB0tBgc8/U0I7_tAxLCI/AAAAAAAArJc/omFHCjwRBFg/s1600/IMG_9jgvdx828.JPG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They provide food and cover for aquatic insects,\ncrustaceans, snails, and fish --and prevent overheating of lake water.</span> </span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nutrients\nare also captured and utilized by aquatic plants, preventing them from reaching\nalgae in the open portion of a lake.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CBKeHsVMzOQ/U0I8J_UYKqI/AAAAAAAArJk/OTLcU_dlfG0/s1600/imrgggages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CBKeHsVMzOQ/U0I8J_UYKqI/AAAAAAAArJk/OTLcU_dlfG0/s1600/imrgggages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Do NOT ever think that\nwater hyacinth leaves protect the lake from evaporation. Rather it causes more\nwater loss due to <span style=\"color: red;\">evapotranspiration </span>(loss of water through leaves through\ntranspiration).</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Transpiration accounts\nfor the movement of water within a plant and the subsequent loss of water as\nvapor through stomata in its leaves. &nbsp;An\nelement (such as a water hyacinth &nbsp;) that\ncontributes to evapotranspiration can be called an evapotranspirator.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Death and decay of\nwater hyacinth vegetation in large masses deteriorates water quality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/WOuRVCVR5g4/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/WOuRVCVR5g4&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/WOuRVCVR5g4&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Domestic sewage\nentering the lake contains levels of nitrates and phosphates beyond permissible\nlimits, which promote the growth of algae/water hyacinth in the lake. As the\nalgae/water hyacinth decompose,&nbsp; it uses\nlot of available oxygen in the water thereby making it deficient for other\naquatic fauna like fish etc. causing the death of these organisms .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What worsens the\nsituation in urban India is the construction of illegal structures and slums-as\na part of vote bank politics. &nbsp;Such slums\nare usually not connected to the city\u2019s sewage systems. It is therefore\nimportant for India to invest in building affordable sewage\nsystems\u2014rather than giving 10 billion euro to Italy\u2014nay\u2014Euro zone so that they\ncan drink better wine..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lack of\noxygen ultimately affects the decomposition of algae also and which simply\nfalls to the bottom of the lake adding to the&nbsp;\nhigh levels of organic matter in the lake bed. Non-decomposition of\norganic matter, non availability of oxygen,&nbsp;\nresult in emanation of various gases from the lake bed causing lot of\nfoul smell from the lake.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If eutrophication is\nsevere, it may create hypoxic conditions in a water body. Hypoxia is\ncharacterized by low amount of oxygen dissolved in water bodies. Such a\ncondition has harmful effects on the life of aquatic fauna, resulting in dead\nzones.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Phosphorous, primarily\nin the form of phosphate, is not as soluble as nitrate and is primarily\ntransported by sediment in runoff, often ending up in lakes , rivers and\nstreams.&nbsp; Ground water is mainly at risk\nfrom nitrates, which at excessive concentrations are considered a health risk. &nbsp;Highly contaminated ground water cannot be used as drinking water.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NS0p453E8TY/Uz8ca1tBOeI/AAAAAAAAq9E/1EvlVuthPts/s1600/eutro_+Lake+Improvementfqf+Association.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NS0p453E8TY/Uz8ca1tBOeI/AAAAAAAAq9E/1EvlVuthPts/s1600/eutro_+Lake+Improvementfqf+Association.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the naturally\noccurring oxygen in the water is depleted, the algae blooms die, and in their\ndecomposing process, cause further eutrophication. Algae blooms mostly occur in\nareas with still water.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like I said before lanthanum-modified\nbentonite clay (Phoslock) application can remove phosphorus from water. Algae\ncan be killed by any algecide . &nbsp;But\nphosphorus is like sugar in water and has to be locked and removed by any nano\ntechnology..</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uKKt85dUlDc/Uz9xCF1I87I/AAAAAAAAq9U/UkE8CHKwF7k/s1600/phoslocksidryeebyside.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"377\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uKKt85dUlDc/Uz9xCF1I87I/AAAAAAAAq9U/UkE8CHKwF7k/s1600/phoslocksidryeebyside.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Phoslock permanently locks phosphorus into an inert\nmineral that sinks to the bottom and becomes part of the pond's natural\nsediments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/iQNQ6fefhFQ/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/iQNQ6fefhFQ&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/iQNQ6fefhFQ&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OR <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">action saying that I am\nmore powerful than reaction<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DShbwJcLlL8/Uz_jDvMQ7RI/AAAAAAAArDU/3XbIiEJSG14/s1600/imahrtges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DShbwJcLlL8/Uz_jDvMQ7RI/AAAAAAAArDU/3XbIiEJSG14/s1600/imahrtges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">evaporation saying that\nI am more powerful than condensation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VfdBmKn0Ct4/Uz_jK4wzAAI/AAAAAAAArDc/A0KgLjUe7cA/s1600/imtykytkages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"121\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VfdBmKn0Ct4/Uz_jK4wzAAI/AAAAAAAArDc/A0KgLjUe7cA/s1600/imtykytkages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">north pole saying that\nI am more powerful than south pole.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UcePjfhe2mo/Uz_jP97NYwI/AAAAAAAArDk/pgpoecuunFo/s1600/imagtrjyes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UcePjfhe2mo/Uz_jP97NYwI/AAAAAAAArDk/pgpoecuunFo/s1600/imagtrjyes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>See, when you inject poison\ninto the wisdom of Sanatana Dharma , you must know where and how to inject\u2014 or you\nlook like worse than an idiot .<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excessive nitrate (NO3)\nin drinking water can cause human and animal health problems, particularly for\nsmall babies. &nbsp;The United States Public\nHealth Service has established a specific standard of 10 milligrams of nitrate\nnitrogen per liter as the maximum concentration safe for human consumption. &nbsp;The maximum contaminant level for nitrate, as\nset by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), is 10 mg/liter, or 10\nppm. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excess nitrates\ndecrease the ability of blood to carry vital oxygen through the body. The\nmouth, hands, and feet of those suffering from the condition may appear blue. &nbsp;Babies with the syndrome may also have other\nsymptoms, including trouble breathing, as well as vomiting and diarrhea. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/BosHU4ARR9w/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/BosHU4ARR9w&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/BosHU4ARR9w&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the body nitrates\nare converted to nitrites. The nitrites react with hemoglobin in the red blood\ncells to form methemoglobin, affecting the blood\u2019s ability to carry enough\noxygen to the cells of the body. Bottle-fed infants less than three months of\nage are particularly at risk. The hemoglobin of infants is more susceptible and\nthe condition is made worse by gastrointestinal infection. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrate or nitrites in\ndrinking water are associated with cancer in adults. Nitrate is reduced to\nnitrite in the gut and nitrite reacts with specific food breakdown products\n(amines) to form highly carcinogenic nitrosamines. &nbsp;This is a convoluted path to cancer, but is\nassuming greater importance as nitrate in food and drinking water slowly\nincreases worldwide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To prevent nitrates in\nwater apply two-thirds to three-fourths of the planned artificial fertilizer\nnitrogen just before the crop enters a period of rapid growth. &nbsp;Proper timing ensures maximum daily nitrogen\nuptake and minimizes the likelihood of unused nitrogen leaching below the plant\nroots. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Best is NOT to have any\ngolf courses and lawns nearby the lake. Avoid surface water run off into take, especially\nduring the initial rains.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Utilizing aeration, the\nnitrification stage utilizes aerobic bacteria to turn Ammonia into Nitrite and\nthen Nitrate. &nbsp;Nitrogen removal happens\nin the denitrification stage as bacteria consume the Oxygen from Nitrate\nturning it into Nitrogen gas that escapes into the atmosphere. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Be_l195BBuU/Uz-h7VKweTI/AAAAAAAAq_g/4cWhAnxiVJw/s1600/imaukltges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"226\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Be_l195BBuU/Uz-h7VKweTI/AAAAAAAAq_g/4cWhAnxiVJw/s1600/imaukltges.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aerobic bacteria\nconsume oxygen. Anaerobic bacteria consume methane and die when the lake is aerated.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;Wastewater treatment plants play it\nsafe by running their blowers full speed 24 hours a day 7 days a week for the\naerobic bacteria to survive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ammonification is a\none-way reaction in which organisms break down amino acids and produce ammonia\n(NH3). &nbsp;Nitrification is the process in\nwhich ammonia is oxidized to nitrite and nitrate, yielding energy for\ndecomposer organisms. Two groups of microorganisms are involved in\nnitrification. Nitrosomonas oxidizes ammonia to nitrite and water.\nSubsequently, Nitrobacter oxidizes the nitrite ions to nitrate. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anaerobic bacteria in lakes\nproduce a mucus-like layer of slime, or biomat, which create large amounts of\nnitrate.&nbsp; The expensive way is to empty\nthe lake to kill all anaerobic bacteria and charge fresh aereated water.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bottom aeration systems\nprovide a beneficial and cost effective method of improving both the water\nquality of your pond and it's overall health.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JoG9dZcD-Jw/Uz-hypT8o9I/AAAAAAAAq_Y/H5oy14HpjYg/s1600/Compressor-d6i56iffusers-300x300.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JoG9dZcD-Jw/Uz-hypT8o9I/AAAAAAAAq_Y/H5oy14HpjYg/s1600/Compressor-d6i56iffusers-300x300.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most important\ncriteria to consider with a lake is the amount of dissolved oxygen (DO) in the\nwater. &nbsp;Just like us, fish need oxygen to\nsurvive.&nbsp; So how do you know if you have\nenough oxygen in the lake? &nbsp;Typically\nmeasured in Parts per Million (PPM) you should be aiming for a minimum DO level\nof between 4 and 5 PPM. So what causes low dissolved oxygen levels? <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Q-_I3BJ2X8k/Uz-kLfZpi7I/AAAAAAAArAE/NTyALSM8vws/s1600/article-0-14FA8A42000005DC-950_64ui4634x919.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Q-_I3BJ2X8k/Uz-kLfZpi7I/AAAAAAAArAE/NTyALSM8vws/s1600/article-0-14FA8A42000005DC-950_64ui4634x919.jpg\" width=\"440\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excessive amounts of\nAlgae and aquatic plants are the main culprits because they will absorb a\nlot&nbsp; of oxygen after nightfall. &nbsp;An abundance of organic waste i.e High silt\nlevels will cause oxygen levels to be reduced and silt can also release harmful\ngasses into the water. Finally, having too many fish can also reduce the oxygen\nlevels not only through lack of oxygen per fish but high waste inputs into the\nwater. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vRcJp-XPAoo/Uz-jhnmhf6I/AAAAAAAAq_8/SyRkLTFqmYY/s1600/imagepuggs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vRcJp-XPAoo/Uz-jhnmhf6I/AAAAAAAAq_8/SyRkLTFqmYY/s1600/imagepuggs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bottom based diffuser\nsystem that forces air down to the base of the pond, enabling it to bubble back\nup may be the better bet. The threat of Stratification is also reduced as\nsufficient oxygen levels at the foot of the pond are maintained Noxious smells\nare also reduced and overall water quality is improved. Silt reduction would\nalso benefit from increased oxygen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0iL65Ve_hk4/Uz-iFenQY3I/AAAAAAAAq_o/hF_dvZONdWw/s1600/DiffuserUnderwater-DM4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"510\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0iL65Ve_hk4/Uz-iFenQY3I/AAAAAAAAq_o/hF_dvZONdWw/s1600/DiffuserUnderwater-DM4.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amount of oxygen in\nthe water is an important indicator of overall lake health. In fact, much\ninformation can be gathered about a lake by examining just this parameter. Oxygen\nplays a crucial role in determining the type of organisms that live in a lake.\nSome fish species, need consistently high oxygen concentrations to survive.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the summer\nmonths, when water is warm, oxygen can be consumed faster than it can be\nreplenished. Lakes can become \"stratified\"; the warmer, oxygen-rich\nupper water laying on top of the cool, more dense, lower-oxygen deeper water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such conditions inhibit\nlevels of beneficial bacteria and their breakdown of organics. Bottom muck\naccumulation increases and excessive nutrients are readily available for\nplant/algae growth. &nbsp;This thermal\nstratification also makes conditions favorable for the production of noxious\nammonia and hydrogen sulfide gases. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vertex bottom aeration\nsystems create a vertical current using the rising force of millions of small\nbubbles to entrain the water column, \"turning the lake over\" and\nallowing oxygen to be absorbed at the lake's surface.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By moving the\nlower-oxygen water up from the bottom and eliminating thermal stratification,\noxygen levels throughout the water column are increased. Wide swings in oxygen\nare stabilized, preventing fish kills.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JFcjJhVlF8c/Uz-jRU401ZI/AAAAAAAAq_0/icW1kQH21nY/s1600/fishcollecjrtor.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"410\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JFcjJhVlF8c/Uz-jRU401ZI/AAAAAAAAq_0/icW1kQH21nY/s1600/fishcollecjrtor.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vertex Aeration systems also improve\nsport fisheries by allowing fish to expand their territory into formerly\noxygen-deprived portions of the lake.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oxygen is easily\ndissolved in water. In fact, it is so soluble that water can contain a greater\npercentage of oxygen than the atmosphere. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of this phenomenon, oxygen naturally\nmoves (diffuses) from the air into the water. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aeration of the water surface by winds and\nwaves enhances this diffusion process. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vertical\nmixing of the water, aided by winds, distributes the oxygen within the lake.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this manner, it becomes&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">available to the\nlake's community of oxygen-breathing organisms. Water temperature affects the\ncapacity of water to retain dissolved oxygen. Cold water can hold more oxygen\nthan warm water. Therefore, a lake will typically have a higher concentration\nof dissolved oxygen during winter than summer.</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rich people have their\nprivate lawns. &nbsp;They use pesticides to\nkeep weeds under control. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-74sFYk-3rZs/Uz-t3cxnZjI/AAAAAAAArA0/CEwcijIYktg/s1600/imay54ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-74sFYk-3rZs/Uz-t3cxnZjI/AAAAAAAArA0/CEwcijIYktg/s1600/imay54ges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These\npesticides percolate into ground water and cause kidney , liver , brain\ndiseases and cancer to the people who consume this water.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Xku9IyuTqEs/Uz-txlb8FWI/AAAAAAAArAs/cPSRI0W2nWs/s1600/dead-lawn-herepairing.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"436\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Xku9IyuTqEs/Uz-txlb8FWI/AAAAAAAArAs/cPSRI0W2nWs/s1600/dead-lawn-herepairing.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These rich people will of course have\nexpensive reverse osmosis plants , with activated carbon filters in their\nkitchen, and so they do NOT care.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xk61Law3hP8/Uz-tsUD5hKI/AAAAAAAArAk/5xE2CLCLINs/s1600/private-lawfwwns-250x250.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xk61Law3hP8/Uz-tsUD5hKI/AAAAAAAArAk/5xE2CLCLINs/s1600/private-lawfwwns-250x250.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nplay golf where to maintain the grass excessive ground water, urea to keep\ngrass green ,&nbsp; phosphate fertilisers and\ndangerous pesticides are used.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobody cares.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KFfB8U63Xbc/Uz-tlX-2NkI/AAAAAAAArAc/W0I7iOOyeLg/s1600/Noida-Golf-Codffurse.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"341\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KFfB8U63Xbc/Uz-tlX-2NkI/AAAAAAAArAc/W0I7iOOyeLg/s1600/Noida-Golf-Codffurse.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the bacteria,\nviruses, parasites, and fungi that contaminate ground water comes from fecal\nmaterial from humans and other animals. &nbsp;Common\nbacterial contaminants include E. coli, Salmonella, Shigella, and Campylobacter\njejuni. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It is estimated that more than 620 million\npeople in India still defecate in the open and more than 70 % of Indian\nhouseholds do not treat their drinking water . <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OqRYCxQYOyM/Uz-3WIGn58I/AAAAAAAArCk/0Vqh4kDVQJ8/s1600/sla0bj+1.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"364\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OqRYCxQYOyM/Uz-3WIGn58I/AAAAAAAArCk/0Vqh4kDVQJ8/s1600/sla0bj+1.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind you in 300 years\nflat the white invader robbed us blind and converted India from the riches\nnation to the poorest on the planet. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are the same\npeople who are sarcastic with us for being poor and unhygienic. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having been at sea for\n4 decades I do know how the poor people in white countries survive, their\nstandards of hygiene\u2014 how often they take a bath and change their yellow\nspotted ( at asshole area ) &nbsp;underwear..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EoatwSL7ylU/Uz-wxL8XQEI/AAAAAAAArBA/NnfOQwvWQmk/s1600/imafdddge003.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EoatwSL7ylU/Uz-wxL8XQEI/AAAAAAAArBA/NnfOQwvWQmk/s1600/imafdddge003.jpg\" width=\"484\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Untreated sewage\nrunning off into ground water causes water borne diseases like diarrhoea,\ndysentery, hepatitis , cholera, typhoid etc.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7vDsrDOZV-I/Uz-2-QnWzEI/AAAAAAAArCc/LadRmGVlN3E/s1600/Clipboabk+rd05.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7vDsrDOZV-I/Uz-2-QnWzEI/AAAAAAAArCc/LadRmGVlN3E/s1600/Clipboabk+rd05.jpg\" width=\"375\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first rains surface\nrun off must NOT enter the lake . Too much stray dog shit lying around is no\ngood.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viruses in sewage effluent include entero- and adeno-viruses.
