font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide is a molecule that our body\nproduces to help its 50 trillion cells communicate with each other by\ntransmitting signals throughout the entire body. &nbsp;People with diabetes usually have lower levels\nof Nitric oxide than patients without diabetes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Treating cut flowers and other\nplants with Nitric oxide has been shown to lengthen the time before wilting. The\nOpiate drug Morphine , the addictive pain killer, works by an increase in\nNitric Oxide release.&nbsp; Nitroglycerin and\nAmyl Nitrite tablets serve as vasodilators because they are converted to Nitric\nOxide in the body, to ease angina pain ( heart pain ). Viagra which gives old\nlecherous rich men a hard on , works due to its action on Nitric oxide. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide is a gas\nthat affects blood vessels.&nbsp; It is a\nsimple molecule, having two atoms - nitrogen and oxygen.&nbsp; But it does an incredible array of things.&nbsp; Our blood vessels make nitric oxide. It's a\npotent and facile dilator. Nitric oxide or nitrogen monoxide, molecule has the\nchemical formula NO.&nbsp; It is a free\nradical and is an important intermediate in the chemical industry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the human body\nreaches the age of 27 years, the secretion of nitric oxide is at its peak. As\nyou get&nbsp; older and the production of\nnitric oxide in the human body declines gradually, more from age 42 onwards. In\nmammals including humans, NO is an important cellular signaling molecule\ninvolved in many physiological and pathological processes.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a powerful\nvasodilator with a short half-life of a few seconds in the blood.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide controls\nblood flow in our body.&nbsp; It controls our\nvascular resistance , the blood pressure . When your body produces sufficient\namounts of Nitric oxide, then your blood vessels are relaxed, and your blood\npressure is low.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7Gy1nkk-8RQ/Uyun_H8JXCI/AAAAAAAAqio/P7YVFnGUd6s/s1600/imagkhies+(3).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7Gy1nkk-8RQ/Uyun_H8JXCI/AAAAAAAAqio/P7YVFnGUd6s/s1600/imagkhies+(3).jpg\" width=\"318\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conversely if you're\nnot making enough or Nitric Oxide production is inactivated,&nbsp; then&nbsp;\nyour blood vessels become contracted and your blood pressure shoots up.&nbsp; So this is an important feature of the blood\nvessels is its&nbsp; ability to control its\nown diameter automatically.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The endothelium (inner\nlining) of blood vessels uses Nitric oxide to signal the surrounding smooth\nmuscle to relax, thus resulting in vasodilation and increasing blood flow.\nNitric oxide is highly reactive (having a lifetime of a few seconds), yet\ndiffuses freely across membranes.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide is part of\nthe body's self-defense mechanism.&nbsp; It\ncan defend against bacteria.&nbsp; It also\ndefends against tumor cells.&nbsp; Nitric\nOxide in higher concentrations can actually halt the growth of cells or can\nhalt bacterial growth, so it's a defense against infection. Macrophages,\ncertain cells of the immune system, produce Nitric oxide in order to kill\ninvading bacteria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a defense against\ntumor and cancer. It is a defense against hardening of the arteries too.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-W3DfBmq3Zfo/Uyup95gaOGI/AAAAAAAAqjA/dCi8ZvbXzqY/s1600/imagjvges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-W3DfBmq3Zfo/Uyup95gaOGI/AAAAAAAAqjA/dCi8ZvbXzqY/s1600/imagjvges.jpg\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally, in a young\nperson who does not have hardened arteries,&nbsp;\nthe blood vessels make sufficient amounts of Nitric oxide, and there is\nno need to take any medicine. When people get old and have heart problems due\nto hardened arteries and angina pain, you can give Nitric oxide -&nbsp; (nitroglycerin in a pill kept under the\ntongue ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or you can improve the\nrelease of Nitric oxide from the blood vessels themselves and enhance the\nbody's ability to make Nitric oxide, or for the matter, protect Nitric oxide\nfrom being broken down.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide - is our\nself-defense system against athrosclerosis.&nbsp;\nThe endothelial lining of the blood vessel is like Teflon.&nbsp; It keeps things from sticking to the vessel\nwall.&nbsp; The reason it has this property of\nTeflon is because it releases nitric oxide, so it's a non-sticky surface\nbecause it's releasing nitric oxide, which not only relaxes the blood vessel\nbut also prevents things from sticking to the vessel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric Oxide is of\ncritical importance as a mediator of vasodilation in blood vessels.&nbsp; The vasodilatory actions of Nitric oxide\nplays a key role in renal control of extracellular fluid homeostasis and is\nessential for the regulation of blood flow and blood pressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitroglycerin, Amyl\nnitrite, \"poppers\" (isobutyl nitrite or similar) and other nitrite\nderivatives are used in the treatment of heart disease and Angine\npectoris.&nbsp; The compounds get converted to\nNitric oxide which in turn dilates the coronary artery (blood vessels around\nthe heart), thereby increasing its blood supply. &nbsp;These drugs, however, are\npredominantly venodilators, dilating peripheral veins and hence reducing venous\nreturn and preload to the heart. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kOJzZeVLMns/Uys8eNmI1BI/AAAAAAAAqh0/bwIn2lk3xJ0/s1600/imagesNJG.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kOJzZeVLMns/Uys8eNmI1BI/AAAAAAAAqh0/bwIn2lk3xJ0/s1600/imagesNJG.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This reduces the oxygen\nrequirement of the myocardium and subsequently lessens the heart pain. By\ndilating (expanding) the veins, Nitric oxide drugs lower arterial pressure and\nleft ventricular filling pressure.&nbsp; This\nvasodilation does not decrease the volume of blood the heart pumps, but rather\nit decreases the force the heart muscle must exert to pump the same volume of\nblood. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The interior surface\n(endothelium) of your arteries produce nitric oxide. When plaque builds up in\nyour arteries, called atherosclerosis, you reduce your capacity to produce\nNitric oxide, which is why physicians prescribe nitroglycerin for heart and\nstroke patients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As I said before Nitric\nOxide plays a role in erection of the penis. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bija mantras are\none-syllable seed sounds that, when said aloud, activate the energy of the\nchakras in order to purify &amp; balance the mind &amp; body. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you speak the bija\nmantras, you resonate with the energy of the associated chakra.--as mentioned\nin the&nbsp; Jabala Darsana Upanishad in 5000\nBC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ham, Yam, Ram, Vam and\nLam are the panch bhoota mantras.&nbsp; The\nfive elements evolve from the five tanamatras (principals); earth from gandha\n(smell), water from rasa (taste), fire from rupa (sight), air from sparsha (touch)\nand akasha from shabda (hearing).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When sounding the bija mantras for the\nchakras we are connecting with the different elements. The connection with the\nelement is created by the tongue position in the mouth and by visualising the\nshape of the element when sounding the mantra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AJpK3Gekk6E/UywOJXAh-LI/AAAAAAAAqkk/1NndLOEi3jE/s1600/Page+10+Cu65ehakra.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AJpK3Gekk6E/UywOJXAh-LI/AAAAAAAAqkk/1NndLOEi3jE/s1600/Page+10+Cu65ehakra.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201cLAM\u201d-&nbsp; Muladhara chakra 1 (root)</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When properly produced,\nthe sound LANG excites the nadis (subtle channels of energy) in the first\nchakra and creates a lock that prevents the downward movement of energy. LA is\nthe sound for the earth element and NG is nada-bindu, the primal cosmic sound\nfrom which the universe manifested. Repetition of the bija manta LANG deepens\nconcentration, giving awareness and inner strength. Its vibrations create a\npassage inside the Brahma Nadi. Brahma Nadi, is the subtle channel through which\nthe Kundalini, when awakened moves from Muladhara to Sahasrara Chakra. The\nelement associated with the Muladhara Chakra is Earth. The square is the symbol\nfor Earth. It represents the four directions and the four dimensions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201cVAM\u201d-&nbsp; Swadisthana chakra 2 (sacral/navel)</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the bija mantra\nVANG is repeated the Svadhishtana Chakra is purified. The power of Varuna, an\naspect of Vishnu (the sustainer of creation) is present in thebija mantra VANG.\nIn Hindu mythology, Varuna is considered the god of all forms of the water\nelement. When the bija mantra VANG is repeated it enhances the production and\ncirculation of fluids in the body. The shape associated with this element is\nthe circle, which represents the element water. Water droplets are spherical.\nWater is the essence of life. Almost three quarters of the human body is water,\nwhich is present in blood, mucous, urine, saliva, lymph and other fluids.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201cRAM\u201d- Manipura chakra\n3 (solar plexus)</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bija mantra for\nthis chakra is RAM sounded as RANG.&nbsp; Agni\nis the god of fire and the acceptor of sacrifices. The ram is the vehicle of\nAgni. The ram is the carrier of the bija mantra RAM. The sound RANG increases\nthe digestive fire, which enhances assimilation and absorption. It contributes\nto longevity, the main goal of a person motivated by this chakra. The nature of\nfire is to move upwards and the repetition of this mantra, when produced\nproperly helps the upward movement of the Kundalini. The fire element in the\nnavel region aids in the digestion and absorption of food,which supplies the\nwhole body with vital energy. The fire element is related tohunger, thirst,\nsleep, lethargy and radiance (ojas). The triangle is the symbol of the fire\nelement. Visualisation of a triangle of bright redcolour in the Manipura Chakra\nhelps the aspirant in his/her spiritual evolution<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201cYAM\u201d- Anahata chakra 4\n(heart)</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bija mantra for\nthis chakra is YAM sounded as YANG. The mantra is focused in the heart chakra.\nWhen this sound is produced properly the spiritual heart vibrates and any blocks\nin the cardiac region are cleared. True knowledge dawns in the consciousness\nand the second knot, the Vishnu Granthi, is undone, allowing energy to start to\nflow upward. Sounding the bija mantra YANG gives one control over air, prana\nand the breath. The bija mantra YANG is the sound form of the deity Vayu, the\nlord of the air/wind. The Anahata Chakra is associated with the six-pointed\nstar which is made up of two triangles. The one pointing upwards symbolises\nShiva, the male principal. The other triangle points downward symbolising\nShakti, the female principal--stolen by the Jews.&nbsp; The six-pointed star also symbolises the\nbalancing of energy in the Heart chakra, which lies between the three chakras\nabove it and the three chakras below it. The Anahata Chakra is associated with\nlove and the desire for sharing and sympathy. Here energy can move upward or\ndownward. The element associated with the Anahata Chakra is vayu (air or wind).\nVayu is thevital life-giving force (prana). It aids the functions of the lungs\nand heart, circulating fresh oxygen and vital energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201cHAM\u201d- Vishudha chakra\n5 (throat)</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bija mantra for\nthis chakra is HAM sounded as HANG. The \u2018H\u2019 sound in the bija mantra HANG is\nproduced at the back of the throat. The mantra is focused in the throat chakra.\nWhen this sound is produced properly. It vibrates the brain and causes the\ncerebrospinal fluid to flow more freely in the throat region.&nbsp; The Vishuddha Chakra is associated with the\nelement akasha (ether) and the sense of hearing, as well as the action of\nspeaking. The symbol for this chakra is the crescent. The sliver crescent is\nthe symbol of nada, pure cosmic sound. The moon implies psychic energy,\nclairvoyance andcommunication without words. The influence of the five elements\nceases after the fifth chakra and the aspirant becomes a tattvatit, one who has\ngone beyond the grip of the elements.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cOM\u201d- Ajna chakra 6\n(third eye/brow)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bija mantra AUM .\nThe pravana, AUM, is the source of all sounds and is connected with anahata\nnada, the primal cosmic sound. It thus creates unity and is a combination of\nsun (A), moon (U), and fire (M). The third eye plays an important role in the\npiercing of the third knot, Rudra Granthi. When Rudra Granthi is pierced,\nindividuality is dropped, the old ego awareness is left behind and the\nexperience of unmanifest consciousness emerges at the Sahasrara Chakra. The\nsymbol for this chakra is the circle with two petals on either side. A person\nwho has reached this level of awareness has a body that constantly radiates the\nsound AUM. The aura of such persons enables all those who come into their\npresence to become calm and sensitive to the refined sound frequencies of AUM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201cALL AH\u201d-&nbsp; Sahasrara chakra 7 (crown)</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanskrit the word\n\u2018Sahasrara\u2019, means thousand, so the Sahasrara Chakra is the \u2018Lotus of the\nThousand Petals\u2019 and is located four finger-breadths above the crown of the\nhead. When the Kundalini is raised up to the Sahasrara Chakra, the illusion of\nthe \u2018individual self\u2019 is dissolved. According to the scriptures, the Sahasrara\nChakra is the seat of the self-luminous Self, the essence of being. The sounds\nassociated with this chakra are ALL and AH&nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BehIVElGHmI/UywNkreWOfI/AAAAAAAAqkc/H3FJsB2xb_k/s1600/bija-mantras.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BehIVElGHmI/UywNkreWOfI/AAAAAAAAqkc/H3FJsB2xb_k/s1600/bija-mantras.jpg\" width=\"238\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Houm (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0939\u094c\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the beej mantra\nof Lord Shiva to dispel sorrow.&nbsp; &nbsp;Ha is Siva and au is Sadasiva. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dum (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0926\u0942\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the beej mantra\nof Goddess Durga\u2014to protect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kreem (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u094d\u0930\u0940\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the beej mantra\nof Goddess Kali to overcome unhappiness and to arouse kundalini ( supreme life force ) . &nbsp;&nbsp;Ka is\nKali, ra is Brahman, and ee is Mahamaya.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hreem ( <span style=\"background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype\n id=\"_x0000_t75\" coordsize=\"21600,21600\" o:spt=\"75\" o:preferrelative=\"t\"\n path=\"m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe\" filled=\"f\" stroked=\"f\">\n <v:stroke joinstyle=\"miter\"/>\n <v:formulas>\n  <v:f eqn=\"if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @0 1 0\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum 0 0 @1\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @2 1 2\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @3 21600 pixelWidth\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @3 21600 pixelHeight\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @0 0 1\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @6 1 2\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @7 21600 pixelWidth\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @8 21600 0\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @7 21600 pixelHeight\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @10 21600 0\"/>\n </v:formulas>\n <v:path o:extrusionok=\"f\" gradientshapeok=\"t\" o:connecttype=\"rect\"/>\n <o:lock v:ext=\"edit\" aspectratio=\"t\"/>\n</v:shapetype><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_4\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1027\" type=\"#_x0000_t75\"\n alt=\"Description: http://www.rudraksha-ratna.com/images/mantra_images/BM4.gif\"\n style='width:15pt;height:18.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image001.gif\"\n  o:title=\"BM4\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://www.rudraksha-ratna.com/images/mantra_images/BM4.gif\" height=\"25\" src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image001.gif\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_4\" width=\"20\" /><!--[endif]--></span>)<span style=\"background-color: white; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the beej mantra\nof Maha maya ( consciousness ) . Ha means\nSiva, ra is prakriti, ee means Mahamaya. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the beej mantra\nof Goddess Lakshmi for prosperity and fertility.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Sha is Lakshmi, ra means wealth, ee is contentment.\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aim (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0910\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the beej &nbsp;Mantra\nof Goddess Matangi ( the tantric form of Goddess Saraswati ) for learning and mastery of arts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Klim (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u094d\u0932\u0940\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the beej mantra\nfor Lord Krishna to acquire happiness.. &nbsp;La means lord of the senses. Ee means &nbsp;satisfaction. &nbsp;bring happiness and sorrow. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hoom <span style=\"background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape\n id=\"Picture_x0020_8\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1026\" type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://www.rudraksha-ratna.com/images/mantra_images/BM8.gif\"\n style='width:18.75pt;height:18.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image002.gif\"\n  o:title=\"BM8\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://www.rudraksha-ratna.com/images/mantra_images/BM8.gif\" height=\"25\" src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image002.gif\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_8\" width=\"25\" /><!--[endif]--></span><span style=\"background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;\"><br />\n<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br />\n<!--[endif]--></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a beej matra\nofShiva.&nbsp; &nbsp;Ha is Siva, and u is Bhairava. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Gam (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0917\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the beej mantra\nfor Lord Ganeshaa to overcome unhappiness.. &nbsp;Ga means Ganesha, and bindu is the dispeller\nof sorrow. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Glaum-&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a beej matra of\nGanesha. &nbsp;Ga means Ganesha, la means that\nwhich pervades, au means luster or brilliance, and bindu is the dispeller of\nsorrow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kshroum (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u094d\u0937\u094d\u0930\u094c\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">)-</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the beej mantra\nof Lord Narasimha for overcoming grief. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>Ksha\nis Narasimha, ra is Brahma, au means with teeth pointing upwards, and bindu\nmeans dispeller of sorrow. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HLREEM-&nbsp;&nbsp; This is the beej mantra of Goddess Bagalamukhi\n&nbsp;(Pitambara / Brahmastra rupini ) . The\naddition of the la-sound to the mantra Hreem gives it the power to stop things.\n&nbsp;This mantra is to stop all internal\nfoes--in the form of fears, doubts, worries, ego, etc. &nbsp;&nbsp;And to paralyze external foes: those who wish\nto do you harm to you in some way, especially in the form of speech and written\nword. Bagalamukhi is the secret presence of the opposite wherein each thing is\ndissolved back into the Unborn and the Uncreated.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/XeoqC8cyNI8/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/XeoqC8cyNI8&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/XeoqC8cyNI8&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Words like namaaha, svaaha,\nsvadha, vashat, voushat, hum and phat are joined to the bijas.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These words\neither depict the mental state of a seeker at the time of chanting the mantra\nor whatever he wishes to achieve... Their implied meanings are as follows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A. <i>Namaaha</i>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : The serene state of the\nantahkaran &nbsp;&nbsp;appeasing the deity of the\nmantra by surrendering to it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">B. <i>Svaaha&nbsp;&nbsp;</i>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : Destruction of harmful energy,&nbsp;appeasing the&nbsp;deity of\nthe mantra with offerings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">C. <i>Svadha&nbsp;</i>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : Self-contentment, strengthening oneself<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">D. <i>Vashat&nbsp;&nbsp;</i>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : A spiritual emotion of destroying the\nenemy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">E. <i>Voushat&nbsp;</i>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : To create conflicts or opposition among\nenemies,&nbsp; to acquire power and wealth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">F. <i>Hum&nbsp;</i>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; :\nAnger and courage, to frighten one\u2019s enemy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">G. <i>Phat&nbsp;</i> &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;: A spiritual emotion of\nattacking the enemy, to drive the enemy away.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; This results in greater diversity, in the energy of the\nmantra .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Example: rheem shreem,\nkreem &nbsp;is a conjoined bijamantra. &nbsp;All the three bijas are various forms of the\nsame energy - rheem = the Great Illusion (Maya), &nbsp;shreem = Lakshmi and kreem = Kali. &nbsp;&nbsp;Thus\nthese 3 beejas represent creation, sustenance and destruction respectively.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Energy of beej mantra\nfrequency activates requisite chakras and channelizes nadis.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantras concluding with\nwords like \u2018hum, phat\u2019 are masculine mantras. Such mantras help in vanquishing\nenemies or in changing the minds of others. Mantras of the Sun deity are\nmasculine mantras.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantras concluding with\nwords like tham, svaha or svadha are feminine mantras. &nbsp;Many such mantras are useful in curing\nillnesses. &nbsp;Mantras of the moon are feminine\nmantras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantras ending with\n\u2018namaha\u2019 are considered as neutral mantras. Such mantras are used to fulfill\nsome desire.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The modern world has\nwoken up to the potential of using &nbsp;the\npower of longitudinal wave sound vibration . font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The uses of mantra is\ndivided into six categories<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. SHANTIKARAN : These\nmantras deal with the cure of diseases and warding off the malefic effects of\nthe planets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I will give examples later.</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2.VASHI KARAN : Through\nthese mantras one can put under one's control any woman, man, officer,\nminister, devta, soul, animal, etc. and can fulfill your wishes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">XXXXXX.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. STAMBHAN : These\nmantras are used to stop all the persons, souls, devtas, etc. from doing any\nharm to you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\"Om namah bhagvate\nshatrunam budhi stambam kuru kuru swaha\".</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. VIDESHAN : these\nmantras are used for creating differences between two or many individuals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">XXXXX.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. UCHCHATTAN : These\nmantras deal with distraction of the mind of the enemy so that they may remain\naway from their country, birthplace, residence, work and family members. It is\nalso used if the sadhak wants a person to remain at war with others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">XXXXXXXX.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8HQ24YKEuAk/Uy-EvZnxmPI/AAAAAAAAqsI/zgC_0yoHNM8/s1600/imayejges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"309\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8HQ24YKEuAk/Uy-EvZnxmPI/AAAAAAAAqsI/zgC_0yoHNM8/s1600/imayejges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. MARAN : These are\ndeath inflicting mantras through which you can kill anybody at any distance\nwithout disclosing your identity. Fake gurus will cause you immense harm as most actions are\nirreversible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantra was evolved by\nseers for the benefit of mankind, to evolve, to achieve perfection and\nliberation - freedom from the vicious circle of senses and maya. &nbsp;No tantric practice involves any ritual of\nharming another being by means of bali or sacrifice. Rather it is about self\nconquest, conquering your desires and mastering yourself, strengthening your\nweakness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many tantrics talk about panch-makaras or 5 elementary practices viz.\nmadya, mansa, matsya, mudra and maithuna. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Only an idiot will hold\nthe chair above his head when told to \u201ctake a chair\u201d. But then all this&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">poison</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;has been&nbsp;deliberately injected by the white invader.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As in Tantra the\npractices and techniques are generally described allegorically or symbolically,\npanch-makaras are not to be taken literally. The Guru deciphers the symbols and\ntechniques and gives an insight to the disciple of such practices.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Madya which literally\nmeans wine or intoxication actually stands for the nectar which drips from\nbindu visarg when deeper practices and pranayamas are performed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Matsya represents\nmovement of prana through Ida and Pingala nadis as a result of the practice of\npranayamas. Ida and Pingala criss cross like the movement of fish ( fish\ntailing ) , which stands for matsya. They establish balance in the body for\nKundalini, the serpent power to move in Sushumna nadi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Mudra is\ngesture/posture, and here it stands for Khechari mudra, where tongue is rolled\nup to touch the soft palette, which releases pranic energy to reach the bindu\nfrom where the nectar drips. Some tantrics also believe it to be dhanya,\ncereal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Mansa or meat is\ngenerally understood as offering meat - animal or human sacrifice but tantra is\nfar away from such practices which inflict even slightest amount of pain to any\nbeing. Bali or sacrifice actually means offering what you have or what you are.\nYou cannot control a single moment of your life, a single breath, so how can\nyou offer life of another being who does not belong to you. Bali is offering\nwhat is yours and even your own body is not yours, you possess only one thing\nand that is your ichcha/desire.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So mansa symbolises sacrificing yourself by\nwinning over your desires. Before the white invader came to India NONE of our\ntemples has any form of blood sacrifice.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
