text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_14.html?showComment=1526343092574#c8416199444397109344\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 15, 2018 at 5:41 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSEA SICKNESS HAS A LOT TO DO WITH THE SPIRIT LEVEL INSIDE THE INNER EAR ( COCHLEA )<br />\n<br />\nI GET DIZZY WHEN I SIT ON A FAST SPINNING MERRY GO ROUND.. WHILE MY WIFE LOVES IT..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS SEASICK WHEN I FIRST JOINED THE SEA..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE WAS NEVER SEA SICK EVEN WHEN THE WHOLE SHIPs CREW WAS AFTER A WEEK OF VERY BAD HURRICANE WEATHER ...<br />\n<br />\nIF PAKISTAN ATTACKS INDIA IN JULY --70% OF OUR INDIAN NAVY OFFICERS WILL BE PUKING THEIR GUTS OUT INSTEAD OF FIGHTING.. I KNOW !<br />\n<br />\nTHE FIRST THING INDIAN NAVY HAS TO DO IS TO ALLOW WHITE UNIFORMS AND CAPS WHICH FLY OFF IN THE WIND --ONLY FOR CEREMONY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN INS BETWA , THE INDIAN NAVY WARSHIP CAPSIZED IN MUMBAI LOCK GATE , NOBODY IN THE WHOLE OF INDIAN NAVY KNEW WHAT HAPPENED ... NOT ONE SINGLE MAN SERVING OR RETIRED..<br />\n<br />\nSO CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD TO TELL THEM WHAT HAPPENED..<br />\n<br />\n##########################<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil December 6, 2016 at 1:49 PM<br />\nIMPORTANT....... IMPORTANT...... IMPORTANT.......... THE WARSHIP INS BETWA , CAPSIZED WHILE UNDOCKING FROM DRYDOCK , DUE TO STABILITY CALCULATIONS NOT BEING DONE PROPERLY ..................... I AM A SHIP CAPTAIN WITH 30 YEARS EXPERIENCE ............. VIRTUAL LOSS OF GM DUE TO UPTHRUST .................... To calculate virtual loss of GM :-............. P= t X MCTC/ LCF ( t is trim in cms )....... virtual loss of GM= PX KM/W ( where W is displacement in tonnes ).............&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Not many people realise that KM reduces with increase of trim................this is the reason why docking/ undocking trim by stern must be as small as possible\u2026\u2026\u2026.. while undocking the most critical and dangerous period is when the ship is afloat with only the aftermost part of keel resting on the aftermost block</span>\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026 \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026..FIRST STEP TO SALVAGE THE PATHETIC INDIAN NAVY IS TO CHANGE THE COLOUR OF THEIR UNIFORM FROM WHITE TO KHAKHI............. ALL RESPONSIBLE PEOPLE INCLUDING THE CAPTAIN MUST BE SACKED......... THIS IS SHEER INCOMPETENCE...........&nbsp;<span style=\"color: purple;\">The interval of time between the stern post landing on the blocks and the ship taking the blocks overall is referred to as the critical period....... During this period part of the weight of the ship is being borne by the blocks, and this creates an upthrust at the stern which increases as the water level falls in the drydock. ......The upthrust causes a virtual loss in metacentric height and it is essential that positive effective metacentric height be maintained throughout the critical period, or the ship will heel over and perhaps slip off the blocks with disastrous results.&nbsp;</span>....capt ajit vadakayil ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n############################<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK NIRMALA SITARAMAN TO ADDRESS THE PROBLEM NOW .. PM MODI MUST BE PERSONALLY INVOLVED...<br />\n<br />\nOUR NAVAL OFFICERS LACK CHARACTER AND COMPETENCE... IN MODERN WARS NAVY WINS BATTLES ..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF ( THIS IS A MOST CRITICAL COMMENT ) --<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTRY<br />\nNAVAL CHIEF<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nAIRFORCE AND ARMY CHIEFS<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nDEANS OF NAVAL ACADEMIES OF INDIA.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; In the telling, the\ndetails are critical and the details of auras can be invaluable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even teachers in\nschools must be trained , as a lot of seizures take place in school , because\nover ambitious parents send their children to school while running high fevers\n, during exams . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Otherwise the 85 lakh\nmanagement quote brain doctor will give do some expensive tests when the child\nis NOT having fits and will prescribe some bullsh#t drugs of wrong dosage,\nwhich does NOT help the child at all. &nbsp;&nbsp;Rather the bad side effects of these drugs does\nmore damage and makes the child a retard.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cannabis or Marijuana\nis banned by the medical profession. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several people came to\nIndia to get a cure for epilepsy and went back as intellectuals after stealing\nour intellectual rights. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; line-height: 24px;\"><b>Pythagoras</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;was NOT even\na mathematician.</span> &nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>He came to Kerala by\nship all the way from Greece 2500 years ago, to cure his debilitating epilepsy with cannabis extract. &nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>He hung\naround in the Kerala School of Math , without understanding a dang thing--</b></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>- but\nhe had some notes with him and went back as the planet\u2019s No 1 mathematician , thinker and a vegetarian to boot.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; People in the ancient days \u2013before &nbsp;Alexander the Great came to India by ship. And\nthe biggest trade port was Calicut my hometown.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\">the text is divided into\ntwo parts \u2014 the former deals with mathematical analysis of arithmetic, algebra,\ntrigonometry and geometry, logistics, algebraic problems, fractions, Rule of\nthree, Kuttakaram, circle and disquisition on R-Sine-- proof for the expansion\nof the sine and cosine functions- integer solutions of systems of first degree\nequations ( kuttakaram)- rules for finding the sines and the cosines of the sum\nand difference of two angles-- the earliest statement of and the Taylor series\n(only some for some functions)-- geometric derivations of series-- tests of\nconvergence ( gora gaand Cauchy stole this )-- fundamentals of calculus--]\ndifferentiation, term by term integration, iterative methods for solutions of\nnon-linear equations-- the theory that the area under a curve is its integral\u2014 hey,\nthis fu#kin\u2019 post is supposed to be about epilepsy !.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">This book contained -\nPythagorean triples-- Pythagorean theorem for the sides of a square and for a\nrectangle - geometric solutions of linear and quadratic equations in a single\nunknown, and give a remarkably accurate figure for the square root of 2,\nobtained by adding 1 + 1\u20443 + 1\u2044(3 x 4) + 1\u2044(3 x 4 x 34), which yields a value\nof 1.4142156, correct to 5 decimal places\u2014 extracts of the works of the great Aryabhatta -\ncategorical definitions of sine, cosine, versine and inverse sine, and\nspecified complete sine and versine tables, in 3.75\u00b0 intervals from 0\u00b0 to 90\u00b0,\nto an accuracy of 4 decimal places- solutions to simultaneous quadratic\nequations-- value of \u03c0 equivalent to 3.1416- how he used this to estimate the\ncircumference of the Earth, arriving at a figure of 24,835 miles, only 70 miles\noff its true value&nbsp; 4700 years ago \u2013 the\nfact that &nbsp;\u03c0 is an irrational number, and that any calculation can only ever be\nan approximation, something not proved in Europe until 1761--.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pythagoras gave his stolen\nAyurveda ( excerpts from treatises of Susruta and Charaka ) to the grandfather\nof Hippocrates. In those days Greeks knew NOTHING of human anatomy and physiology\nbecause of the strict Greek taboo forbidding the dissection of human cadavers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hippocrates , the\nFATHER OF WESTERN MEDICINE tried to fudge 6000 year old Ayurveda and give it\nhis own spin. After all he was just a spin doctor, whose entire knowledge was\nfrom his grandfather.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Example : <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Ayurvedic medicine,\nthere are 3 basic temperaments: Vata (gas), Pitta (bile) and Kapha (phlegm).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hippocrates ( 460BC-\n370 BC ) threw in one more most STUPID item ( blood\u2014TEE HEEE ) into the works. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">For in the Sushruta Samhita, it is stated that blood<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> ( Rakta )</span> , is a<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> DHATU</b>&nbsp; in Ayurveda.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-q4iD86EOhK4/UyqWfkJCT8I/AAAAAAAAqeg/0nubFmjZnUk/s1600/Dhatbdbu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So his fudged treatise talks about - bilious (bile), sanguineous (blood), &nbsp;phlegmatic (phlegm) and atrabiliary (black\nbile). &nbsp;And he removed Vata ( gas ) \u2013the most\nimportant one. &nbsp;Show what an amazing idiot\nhe is.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; In\nthe Ayurvedic system, body is made of water, air, earth, fire and vacuum. Digestion\nis explained as cooking of food with the help of body-fire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OK, FOLKS, TIMES HAS\nNOW COME TO BUST A BOMBSHELL WHICH IS GONNA SHIVER YOUR TIMBERS&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enter Orpheus &nbsp;\u2013 &nbsp;the Indian\nseer , a master musician and sitarist, &nbsp;the\nholy man who brought Pythagoras to Kerala by ship and took him back via Muzris\n( Kodungallur\u2014 cultural centre of Calicut king &nbsp;) Bernice &nbsp;( Red sea port of Egypt ) and Alexandria ( Egypt\n) . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Orpheus was a\nBrahmachari , a celebate sage who was a veena&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">virtuoso</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">. &nbsp; Veena is the oldest musical instrument on the planet.</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jealous Aristotle and Plato tried to paint him\nas a homosexual and a woman hater, which he was NOT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Herodotus had clearly\nwritten that Orpheus who would play divine string music and tame wild animals came\nfrom India.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: Sorry-- there\nare no exotic animals or birds in Greece-- their imagination is limited to\ncows, horses, rabbits etc -- in India we have peacocks, tigers, rhinos, lions,\nelephants, hippos, king cobras\u2014<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7dNnveNH0NQ/UyFeuCPmPOI/AAAAAAAAqM8/N0hiA5IcNl8/s1600/downlkugbuioad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7dNnveNH0NQ/UyFeuCPmPOI/AAAAAAAAqM8/N0hiA5IcNl8/s1600/downlkugbuioad.jpg\" height=\"540\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why are Indians good in\nlife management and they have the best Gurus ? &nbsp;( foreign philosophers have only lifted from\nIndia-100% -- ALL of them ) .&nbsp;&nbsp; Because we\nobserved how exotic wild life behaved in our jungles. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>SUPER PANCHATANTRA &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The post above shows\nwhat wisdom is !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Orpheus , a strict\nvegetarian introduced spirituality to Greece &nbsp;. &nbsp;He\nwas known for the use of holy theertham from a copper bowl and a Tulsi ( basil)\nleaf which he used to keep in his mouth . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cicero called Orpheus ,\nthe tawny hued , a devotee of Bacchus ( Krishna ) crowned with kissos ( Tulsi).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Western historians and\nthe Pope blurred &nbsp;Jesus and Orpheus , and\npretty soon it was Jesus who was attributed to all the qualities of Orpheus \u2013\nenchanting wild animals with a 7 stringed lyre .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KecDWjdncjE/UyFnboET0aI/AAAAAAAAqNo/sVJ_BOtLn6E/s1600/7_foods_chakra_dcbalancing.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KecDWjdncjE/UyFnboET0aI/AAAAAAAAqNo/sVJ_BOtLn6E/s1600/7_foods_chakra_dcbalancing.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The original sitar ( derived from the veena &nbsp;) has\nseven strings &nbsp;which run over curved,\nraised frets ( <span style=\"color: red;\">Rudra / Saraswati veena</span>) , and the remainder are sympathetic strings (tarb, &nbsp;taarif , tarafdaar) which run underneath the\nfrets and resonate in sympathy with the played strings.</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--ulNylDZsHw/UyFjz3goBOI/AAAAAAAAqNM/s8H2WJVXA-M/s1600/sitar_bridnrjktge.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--ulNylDZsHw/UyFjz3goBOI/AAAAAAAAqNM/s8H2WJVXA-M/s1600/sitar_bridnrjktge.jpg\" height=\"426\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was Orpheus who gave\nPythagoras &nbsp;the mathematical relations of\nthe notes on the musical scale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Ch7b6EcjQxk/UyFmmNyHZxI/AAAAAAAAqNY/sP-JRTj4OIM/s1600/imay5eges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Orpheus was a master in\nastrology, and all Greek astrology is though Orpheus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-13lF6MPzuuc/UyFmradO5kI/AAAAAAAAqNg/Mw28FWc64sw/s1600/chakra-swvavasaras.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pythagoras learnt metempsychosis\nfrom India.&nbsp; Metempsychosis is the Greek\nequivalent of the 11000 year old Vedic Hindu doctrine of transmigration of the\nsoul, Karma and and reincarnation after death.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: Saraswati veena&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NFCrdMmAmTM/U70Tb70CI4I/AAAAAAAAta0/eqO__watsX8/s1600/eefdimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NFCrdMmAmTM/U70Tb70CI4I/AAAAAAAAta0/eqO__watsX8/s1600/eefdimages.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"280\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost every Greek text\ntells that Orpheos was famous for Ahimsa or non-violence . In Euripides' play\nHippolytos a father taunts his son with the \"lifeless food\" he eats\nsince taking Orpheos for his \"king.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below : Lord Shiva's rudra veena&nbsp;</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cPR3AyAKxbk/U70Tg455yQI/AAAAAAAAta8/xKLQqk7EKiI/s1600/APJ-Abdul-Kalam-Rudra-Veena_thumb%5B3%5D.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cPR3AyAKxbk/U70Tg455yQI/AAAAAAAAta8/xKLQqk7EKiI/s1600/APJ-Abdul-Kalam-Rudra-Veena_thumb%5B3%5D.jpg\" height=\"416\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Orpheus is praised for\nhis knowledge of medicine and astrology ( ONLY Ayurveda and Indian astrology existed\nthose days).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>MIHIRA MUNI , THE GREAT\nASTROLOGER CUM ASTRONOMER VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The name of India, so\nfar as is known, first appears in Greek literature in the 5th century B.C. in\nthe works of Hekataios and Herodotos. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Herodotos of\nHalikarnassos (484-425 B. C.) whose histories have survived in their entirety\nhad written clearly about India .&nbsp;&nbsp;\nHerodotos writes about India's population, saying that the Indians are\n\"more in number than any nation known to me.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He goes to great\ndetails while telling of Kerala\u2019s&nbsp; wealth\nin gold; He tells about&nbsp; Indian birds and\nbeasts he regards as much bigger than those existing elsewhere, except for\nhorses. Indian clothing he describes as made from wool growing on trees (i.e.\ncotton) and the amazing thin cotton Calico cloth , we use in Kerala as Mundu (\ndhoti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Herodotos' most famous\nstatement about India- that gold is produced in the Indian desert by fierce\nants larger than foxes- , which appears to be bull, just for kicks. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unless these large ants were golden jackals\nwho would call a nearby tiger . &nbsp;Such\njackals had terrific night vision and sniffing ability ( excellent for bomb\ndetection squads ) and leads the tiger to juicy prey , and then eats the left\novers , which the grateful tiger deliberately leave behind.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-B00cNX9DuCA/UyF5txmDAlI/AAAAAAAAqOA/P93XWGBHYHg/s1600/jackal-pups-cwrc-rterjtf28apr09.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-B00cNX9DuCA/UyF5txmDAlI/AAAAAAAAqOA/P93XWGBHYHg/s1600/jackal-pups-cwrc-rterjtf28apr09.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many Indian seers\nvisited Greece , as in 7000 BC, India ruled Palistan ( Palestine ) . Once when Socrates\nwas asked by an Indian seer, what he does for a living . When Socrates replied\nthat he \"investigated human life,\" the Indian laughed aloud , saying\nthat \"no one was able to observe human affairs if he was ignorant of\ndivine matters and consciousness .\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vegetarianism in Greece\nis called Orphikos bios, or \"Orphic way of life\". Only Indians were\nvegetarians those days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aristotle ran down OR\nrather tried to convert Orpheus to be a homosexual like him, just because of a\nsong he wrote about a red-lipped boy on the ship Argos. ( AAHA red lips&nbsp; came out of sucking too hard TEE HEEEE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Orpeheus and the\nconverted Pythagoras forbade the sacrifice of animals\u2014so there goes the western\ntheory of animal sacrifice in Indian temples.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OK, now I see that some\nof my skeptic readers are saying WHAAAA . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So let me quote ( I usually do NOT care for\nsuch third party references ) of the parallels between the Orphic path and the\nyogic as written by Joseph John Campbell : &nbsp;<i>\u201ca system both of thought and practice,\nexactly paralleling that of Indian asceticism, was communicated by initiated\nmasters to little circles of devotees.&nbsp;\nThe soul, it was declared, returned repeatedly to life, bound to the\nwheel of rebirth (compare the Sanskrit samsara).&nbsp; Through asceticism (Sanskrit, tapas),\nhowever, the body could be purged of its Titan dross (Sanskrit, mirjara,\n\u2018shedding\u2019) and the soul released (Sanskrit, moksha, \u2018release\u2019).&nbsp; Also, rituals fostering meditation on the\ngodly factor were of help (Sanskrit, bhakti, \u2018devotion\u2019).&nbsp; And when, at last, in rapture (samadhi), the\ninitiate cleaved to his own intrinsic being (svasvarupman), he was divine\n(Shivaham, \u2018I am Shiva.\u2019</i>)\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gay side kick of\nAristotle wrote : \u201c Orpheus so hated women he chose to be reborn as a\nmotherless swan\u201d&nbsp; . &nbsp;It is a pity that he visited India , yet he knew\nnothing of Brahmacharya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However Plato respects\nOrpheus for his poetry ,the sweet hymns &nbsp;of the hexameter form that revolutionized\nGreek poetry.&nbsp;&nbsp; For Greek / Latin classics\nHomer's Iliad and Odyssey and Virgil's Aeneid have inherent the Dactylic\nhexameter ( heroic hexameter) &nbsp;a form of\nmeter in poetry or a rhythmic scheme, like the metered Sanskrit verses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mysterious The\nTestament of Orpheus was the most important Orphic document for six centuries\nafter it\u2019s \u201cdiscovery\u201d circa 300 AD.&nbsp; In\nit Orpheus says when in Egypt he met Moses who taught him about monotheism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A circa 350 AD hematite\nmagic amulet, once in the collection of the Berlin Museum, depicted a man\ncrucified on a cross with a moon and seven stars above his head and the words\nOrpheoc Bakkikoc. &nbsp;It was declared to be\na forgery by a furious pope Pius XII.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till today modern\nscience has NOT been able to put a finger on the cause which triggers the brain\nseizure.&nbsp; Environmental factors like\ntoxins and pollutants could be a reason.&nbsp;\nMost epilepsy seizures of young children usually starts with a\nnon-specific fever, cough, chest cold wheezing , sometimes diarrhoea indicating a viral\ninfection. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your child has a prolonged\nseizure after a febrile illness, he should be immediately taken to a tertiary\ncare hospital where bedside EEG monitoring facility is available.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India there is an\nexplosion of young children with epileptic brain seizures in the age group of 2\nto 13.&nbsp; FIRES is precipitated by febrile\nillness and is followed by a flurry of convulsions (jerky movements) of one\nside or both sides with the child slipping into unconsciousness. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Children in LKG and UKG\nmust not be permitted in class if the child appears unwell or is running a fever.\n&nbsp;Teachers must be trained to check out\ndrowsy children with fever and chest colds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SIR , Dr. William B.\nO\u2019Shaughnessy , employed by Rothschild in British East india company, came to\nCalicut ( my home town ) and Kottakkal&nbsp; (\none hour away by car ) in 1841, to learn on the medical uses of Cannabis.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You must have heard of\nstudents going to the beach to have fun and a swim , out of which one drowns. Death\nfrom drowning is common among people with epilepsy. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">People with epilepsy\nare not usually cognitively or intellectually challenged.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fTiadvf60JA/UyLWk-TIymI/AAAAAAAAqQU/mtmxEuIpLpY/s1600/dead_m+gfmwn.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If\nchildren had epilepsy episodes in the childhood it is better that the parents\ntell them of their condition so that they are aware of vulnerabilities of lack\nof sleep or indulging in drugs. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drowning can happen in\na tub with only a few inches of water, </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">so\npeople who have seizures probably should stick to showers instead of baths.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epilepsy is a\nneurological condition, which affects the nervous system , specifically the\nbrain , and is also known as a seizure disorder. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4wAFnnH7nSI/UyLcnGaYZgI/AAAAAAAAqRY/RkVCvO2-uMk/s1600/cerebroj6ru1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4wAFnnH7nSI/UyLcnGaYZgI/AAAAAAAAqRY/RkVCvO2-uMk/s1600/cerebroj6ru1.jpg\" height=\"323\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If seizures arise from\na specific area of the brain, then the initial symptoms of the seizure often\nreflect the functions of that area. The right half of the brain controls the\nleft side of the body, and the left half of the brain controls the right side\nof the body.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So if a seizure starts from\nthe right side of the brain, in the area that controls movement in the thumb, then\nthe seizure may begin with jerking of the left thumb or hand. Mothers and\nteachers must give this type of critical information to the doctor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ugi21koBlCk/UyLcZSPcTtI/AAAAAAAAqRQ/LWcNoD2h18I/s1600/imahrhrges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ugi21koBlCk/UyLcZSPcTtI/AAAAAAAAqRQ/LWcNoD2h18I/s1600/imahrhrges.jpg\" height=\"265\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is usually diagnosed\nafter a person has had at least TWO seizures that were not caused by some known\nmedical condition like extremely low blood sugar, heart problems or some other\nmedical condition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Seizures are a symptom\nof something going on in the brain. Seizures seen in epilepsy are caused by\ndisturbances in the electrical activity of the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word\n\"epilepsy\" does not indicate anything about the cause of the person's\nseizures, what type they are, or how severe they are.&nbsp; A seizure is a sudden surge of electrical\nactivity in the brain that usually affects how a person feels or acts for a\nshort time.&nbsp; Seizures are not a disease\nin themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-G4Z-DMyVBQU/UyLb-IOSJcI/AAAAAAAAqRI/0YKQYzU8WhE/s1600/mdsagujtu2b.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-G4Z-DMyVBQU/UyLb-IOSJcI/AAAAAAAAqRI/0YKQYzU8WhE/s1600/mdsagujtu2b.jpg\" height=\"311\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our nervous system is a\ncommunications network that controls every thought, emotion, impression,\nmemory, and movement, essentially defining who we are. &nbsp;Nerves throughout the body function like\ntelephone cables, enabling the brain to communicate with every part of the body\nvia electrical signals. Different areas of the brain control different\nfunctions, as shown in the videos above .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In epilepsy, the\nbrain's electrical rhythms have a tendency to become imbalanced, resulting in\nrecurrent seizures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2qxK63gmZ5g/UyLbxk2WmWI/AAAAAAAAqRA/ZQ2h1IUBB_o/s1600/18loxa61cf1vregexatjpg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2qxK63gmZ5g/UyLbxk2WmWI/AAAAAAAAqRA/ZQ2h1IUBB_o/s1600/18loxa61cf1vregexatjpg.jpg\" height=\"478\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain works on\nelectricity. The brain continuously generates tiny electrical impulses in an\norderly pattern. &nbsp;These impulses travel\nalong the network of nerve cells, called neurons, in the brain and throughout\nthe whole body via chemical messengers called neurotransmitters. &nbsp;A seizure occurs when the brain's nerve cells\nmisfire and generate a sudden, uncontrolled surge of electrical activity in the\nbrain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As shown in the videos\nabove, the upper brain, or cerebrum, is divided into left and right halves,\ncalled cerebral hemispheres ( lobes ). &nbsp;These\nare connected by a bundle of nerve fibers called the corpus callosum. Each\ncerebral hemisphere contains four lobes: frontal, parietal, occipital, and\ntemporal. Each lobe contains many different areas that control a variety of\nfunctions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8pFV8EKqPk8/UyLboMDCyYI/AAAAAAAAqQ4/mlzdm0bUtTI/s1600/imagnmt6tes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8pFV8EKqPk8/UyLboMDCyYI/AAAAAAAAqQ4/mlzdm0bUtTI/s1600/imagnmt6tes.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lower part of the\nbrain contains the brainstem, which controls sleep-wake cycles, breathing, and\nheartbeat. The upper part of the brainstem contains the thalamus and\nhypothalamus. The lower part of the brainstem is continued as the spinal cord,\nwhich carries messages between the brain and the rest of the body.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ez2dBJV-o98/UyLd5dqwTYI/AAAAAAAAqRo/BbxkrQLq9YU/s1600/1074.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ez2dBJV-o98/UyLd5dqwTYI/AAAAAAAAqRo/BbxkrQLq9YU/s1600/1074.jpg\" height=\"512\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nerve cells, or\nneurons, are the building blocks of the brain. They work like computer chips,\nanalyzing and processing information and then sending signals through the nerve\nfibers. The nerve fibers act like telephone cables, connecting different areas\nof the brain, spinal cord, muscles, and glands.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_dU28ogzN1s/UyLbW-jpc7I/AAAAAAAAqQw/duORWtG1tQw/s1600/1-4tjrdci.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_dU28ogzN1s/UyLbW-jpc7I/AAAAAAAAqQw/duORWtG1tQw/s1600/1-4tjrdci.gif\" height=\"433\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nerve cells are so\nsmall that a powerful microscope is needed to see them. There are more than 100\nbillion nerve cells in the brain. &nbsp;During\na seizure, each cell may fire at more than 500 times a second, much faster than\nthe normal rate of about 80 times a second in the brain and spinal cord. Each call\nis bombarded by hundreds of impulses every second.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a well kept\nsecret that Charles Darwin suffered from Panayiotopoulos syndrome, with its\nusual CVS ( cyclic vomiting syndrome ) and brain seizures which made him \u201cnot\ntoo bright\u201d . &nbsp;&nbsp;Can you imagine that in\nthis DNA age we still study this morons\u2019 evolution theory in our school science\nbooks\u2014so that Rothschild could introduce atheist Communism and remove god from\nthe equation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>CHARLES DARWIN AND HIS\nAPPLE VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Idiot Charles Darwin will never understand all this .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Q2MFidbotSY/UyLyJPTLcEI/AAAAAAAAqS8/IGp8M9gcYCM/s1600/ndw.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Q2MFidbotSY/UyLyJPTLcEI/AAAAAAAAqS8/IGp8M9gcYCM/s1600/ndw.gif\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MS378JUFvDI/UyLa4ZTQr2I/AAAAAAAAqQo/GC_RCbngunk/s1600/imajytk5tes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MS378JUFvDI/UyLa4ZTQr2I/AAAAAAAAqQo/GC_RCbngunk/s1600/imajytk5tes.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the wonders of the\nhuman brain is how the billions of individual computers (neurons) in the brain\nfunction in a coordinated fashion to control our movements and breathing, and\nmost importantly, to allow us to think and feel.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0WYBSV1G8WE/UyLdgbd2ozI/AAAAAAAAqRg/I_wQxv80zYg/s1600/brain3btjt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0WYBSV1G8WE/UyLdgbd2ozI/AAAAAAAAqRg/I_wQxv80zYg/s1600/brain3btjt.jpg\" height=\"434\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neurotransmitters are\nthe chemical messengers of the brain. These substances are released at the end\nof the cell and cross the synapse, a tiny space between the walls of one cell's\naxon and the dendrite of the next nerve cell, to bind to receptors located on\nthat dendrite.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qautSxLWvA8/UyLaisK22fI/AAAAAAAAqQg/4E9FSAseHsU/s1600/Synapgerrjrse.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qautSxLWvA8/UyLaisK22fI/AAAAAAAAqQg/4E9FSAseHsU/s1600/Synapgerrjrse.jpg\" height=\"356\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are many kinds of\nneurotransmitters, but each individual nerve cell produces only one major type.\nSome of the neurotransmitters are carried a long distance within the nervous\nsystem. Others, however, have local effects; that is, they are produced by and\nreleased onto cells that are close to each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neurotransmitters are\nimportant in diseases of the nervous system. In Parkinson's disease, for\nexample, cells that manufacture dopamine, an important neurotransmitter that\nregulates movement, are lost. &nbsp;Loss of nerve cells may contribute to the\ndevelopment of epilepsy in some cases.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">For example, prolonged lack of oxygen\nmay cause a selective loss of cells in the hippocampus, which may lead to\nepilepsy.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QwHkyJjuK6I/UyLeQ5WFTjI/AAAAAAAAqRw/EDWeL3SDDXU/s1600/bn7_functionayjlbrain.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QwHkyJjuK6I/UyLeQ5WFTjI/AAAAAAAAqRw/EDWeL3SDDXU/s1600/bn7_functionayjlbrain.jpg\" height=\"341\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the major\nneurotransmitters in the brain shut off or decrease brain electrical activity.\nThey cause nerve cells to stop firing. These neurotransmitters are called\n\"inhibitory\" because they inhibit the activity of the cells. A\nneurotransmitter called GABA is the best-known example of this type.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other neurotransmitters\nstimulate or increase brain electrical activity. That is, they cause nerve\ncells to fire. These are described as \"excitatory.\" Glutamate is an\nexample of this type.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epilepsy is not\nnecessarily inherited.&nbsp; So if a girl\u2019s\nbrother has epilepsy it does NOT mean that you refuse to marry the girl \u2014 as\nhappens in China. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epilepsy has nothing to\ndo with curses, possession by daayins , or other supernatural processes, such as punishment\nfor past Karma, like some ignorant people think . Like asthma, diabetes, and high\nblood pressure, epilepsy is a medical problem.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ohBUJ6GK0ro/UyLl2K3hdxI/AAAAAAAAqSQ/78NxhLYBxXk/s1600/imagesd2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ohBUJ6GK0ro/UyLl2K3hdxI/AAAAAAAAqSQ/78NxhLYBxXk/s1600/imagesd2.jpg\" height=\"411\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generally, people with\nepilepsy have seizures and require medication for only a small portion of their\nlives. About 65 % of people who develop seizures have epilepsy that can be\neasily controlled and is likely to remit or go away. &nbsp;About 25 % may develop difficult to\ncontrol seizures and likely will require lifelong treatment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than half of\nchildhood forms of epilepsy are outgrown by adulthood. With many forms of\nepilepsy in children and adults, when the person has been free of seizures for\nabout 1 or 2 years, medications can often be slowly withdrawn and discontinued\nunder a doctor's supervision.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-X9BmnF0PGKQ/UyLmlD1A0EI/AAAAAAAAqSY/gB_hILsv4sM/s1600/imbtejages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-X9BmnF0PGKQ/UyLmlD1A0EI/AAAAAAAAqSY/gB_hILsv4sM/s1600/imbtejages.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epilepsy is usually caused by\nan imbalance between excitatory and inhibitory neurotransmitters. If the\ninhibitory neurotransmitters in your brain are not active enough, or if the\nexcitatory ones are too active, you are more likely to have seizures.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many of the new\nmedicines being developed to treat epilepsy try to influence these\nneurotransmitters. They try to increase the activity of the inhibitory ones,\nwhich turn cells off, or reduce the activity of the excitatory ones, which turn\ncells on. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Either way, the idea is to\nhave less uncontrolled electrical activity in your brain, and therefore fewer\nseizures. Some people have a distinctive feeling or some other warning sign\nwhen a seizure is coming. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qCzFMejQ2UI/UyLlkDU288I/AAAAAAAAqSI/2g6JHnhPaH4/s1600/migrainestyk87pe2.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qCzFMejQ2UI/UyLlkDU288I/AAAAAAAAqSI/2g6JHnhPaH4/s1600/migrainestyk87pe2.png\" height=\"214\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An early warning like this is\nalso called an aura. &nbsp;Auras can give you enough time to prepare for the seizure and keep yourself\nfrom being badly injured. &nbsp;Most injuries\nfrom seizures happen if there is no warning sign, if the warning is not\nrecognized, or if there is not enough time to react to it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">An aura is a perceptual\ndisturbance and manifests as the perception of a strange light, an unpleasant\nsmell or confusing thoughts or experiences.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dpFcO2u9iLw/UyLlGkH2pKI/AAAAAAAAqSA/2E_3v_nqFXI/s1600/Aura_sbgfjs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dpFcO2u9iLw/UyLlGkH2pKI/AAAAAAAAqSA/2E_3v_nqFXI/s1600/Aura_sbgfjs.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Early\nseizure warnings--<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sensory/Thought:<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visual loss or blurring<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Racing thoughts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stomach feelings<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strange feelings<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tingling feeling<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emotional:<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fear/Panic<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Physical:<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dizziness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Headache<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lightheadedness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nausea<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Numbness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes seizures come\nwith no warning<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Seizure\nsymptoms<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sensory/Thought:<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Black out<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Confusion<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deafness/Sounds<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electric Shock Feeling<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Loss of consciousness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spacing out<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Out of body experience<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visual loss or blurring<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emotional:<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fear/Panic<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Physical:<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chewing movements<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Convulsion<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Difficulty talking<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drooling<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eyelid fluttering<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eyes rolling up<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
