font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dysphoria means loss of\npleasure or joy. &nbsp;This opposite of theword\neuphoria, which means extreme joy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many\npeople who have epilepsy experience dysphoric episodes. &nbsp;These episodes, which can last between a few\nhours and a few days, consist of depressive moods, irritability, lack of\nenergy, pain, anxiety, insomnia, and euphoric moods.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such people would\nbenefit from keeping a pet based on personal choice. It may be a dog or a cat.\nThis is NOT necessary if they get genuine love ( not fake ) from family and\nfriends .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>THE JOY OF HAVING A CAT\nAS A PET VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anxiety disorders have\nbeen associated with the amygdala, a structure in the front part of the\ntemporal lobe. &nbsp;The seizures of temporal\nlobe epilepsy frequently affect the amygdala and cause it to act in different\nways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wanna know more about\namygdala?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>SHAMBHAVI MUDRA ,\nBYPASSING THE AMYGDALA BY PRATYAHARA TO STILL THE MIND &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anxiety can become a\ndisorder, however, if it gets out of hand, causing a constant feeling of\nnervousness, distress, and unease for no apparent reason. Anxiety is also\nrelated to epilepsy in more specific ways. &nbsp;It can occur not only as a reaction to the\ndiagnosis, but also as a symptom of the epilepsy, and, in some cases, as a side\neffect of seizure medicines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The knowledge that a\nseizure can occur at any time and place without very much warning is a major\npoint of anxiety for many people. Some also become anxious about social\nrejection due to their condition, particularly during adolescence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because these symptoms\nof anxiety can be present during a seizure, in many cases the two are hard to\ndifferentiate. In extreme cases, hyperventilation caused by anxiety can trigger\na convulsion, which can further complicate the diagnosis. Also, because the\npanic attacks occur suddenly and without warning, they are extremely\nfrightening; the person usually believes that they represent a serious medical\ncondition.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-iqx1r1JiSxo/UySQsf8O0SI/AAAAAAAAqVw/ZITcrcrFd9c/s1600/07thri4.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-iqx1r1JiSxo/UySQsf8O0SI/AAAAAAAAqVw/ZITcrcrFd9c/s1600/07thri4.gif\" height=\"248\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For people with both epilepsy and anxiety, the neurologist may\nrecommend seizure medicines that also have anti-anxiety effects. Because it may\ninvolve changes in behavior, epilepsy has traditionally straddled the divide\nbetween psychiatry and neurology. &nbsp;This\nunderscores the importance of the parent or teacher watching the symptoms\ncarefully.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychosis (known to\npsychiatrists as psychotic disorder) is a severe mental disorder in which the\nperson loses contact with reality &nbsp;. Some\nforms of psychosis are closely linked to the occurrence of seizures .&nbsp; &nbsp;In\ngeneral, psychotic episodes in people with epilepsy tend to be less severe and\nrespond better to therapy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people with\nepilepsy experience another change\u2014 a loss of interest in sex.&nbsp; Patients with epilepsy have this perception\nof stigma. Stigma is a feeling of discrimination or persecution that we\nexperience when we don't conform to standards. Even if true acts of\ndiscrimination by others are not common, a person may feel stigma and get less\nenjoyment from life as a result.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>It is worth repeating\nagain that brain seizures very rarely happen in a doctor's office. &nbsp;Hence the &nbsp;information given to the doctor by parents,\nteachers , office workers etc &nbsp;is\nextremely important.</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Medical disorders\ninvolving other systems of the body can cause seizures, so your doctor will\nperform a general medical examination as an important part of your first visit\nfor seizures. An examination and some laboratory tests can tell the doctor\nwhether your liver, kidneys, and other organ systems are working properly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people have both\nepilepsy and a medical disorder such as kidney disease or an overactive thyroid\ngland. If you have a disorder of this kind, both your neurologist and your\nprimary doctor should know about it. Your medical disorder may be involved in\ncausing your seizures. Even if it is not, the presence of another disorder may\naffect the seizure medicines that are prescribed for you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the dosage of your\nseizure medicine is too high, it can create obvious side effects, such as:</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Slurred speech<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Trouble concentrating<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Difficulty walking a\nstraight line<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Jerking eye movements\nwhen you look to one side<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Trembling when your\narms are outstretched</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parents, well wisher &nbsp;must be careful\nand inform the doctor.&nbsp; If the\nneurologist finds signs like these, the dosage of medicine may need to be\nreduced.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The experienced neurologist\nmay be examining you even while you are just talking. The doctor is trained to assess\nyour mood, thinking, language, eye and facial movements, strength,\ncoordination, and many other features just by carefully listening and observing\nyou. So don\u2019t fake anything.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MRI (magnetic resonance\nimaging) is the most important neuroimaging test in epilepsy because it can\nhelp to classify both seizure type and syndrome. &nbsp;&nbsp;For example, partial onset seizures that\nsecondarily generalize rapidly can be misinterpreted as primary generalized\nseizures. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-laJUY1qxl9s/UySVoGXwnbI/AAAAAAAAqWA/grk7GulkgF0/s1600/imagnfkges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-laJUY1qxl9s/UySVoGXwnbI/AAAAAAAAqWA/grk7GulkgF0/s1600/imagnfkges.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If MRI shows a structural\nlesion that is the likely source of the seizures, then they can be correctly\nclassified as partial in nature. The classification often is crucial for the\nbest treatment. Information from MRI is used to evaluate the likelihood that\nsurgery would be effective in controlling seizures. &nbsp;Before surgery, MRI helps to identify the\nsurgical approach and the volume of tissue to be removed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FoJZf118eHk/UySVsbBt9hI/AAAAAAAAqWI/Yn8iPBldUok/s1600/h9991ktyk111.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FoJZf118eHk/UySVsbBt9hI/AAAAAAAAqWI/Yn8iPBldUok/s1600/h9991ktyk111.jpg\" height=\"260\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Closed MRIs use a\nstronger magnet (one with a higher field strength), which allows for more\ndetailed images that depict thinner \"slices\" of your brain. The brain\nis an intricate and extraordinarily complex organ. Highly detailed images are\nnecessary to evaluate it. Seizures can originate from or be caused by quite\nsmall (or large) abnormal areas in the brain, from tumors, blood vessel\nabnormalities, abnormal development, or injury.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lLs3GQtT1RI/UySWa0AB5vI/AAAAAAAAqWQ/S6zcV_gi3is/s1600/thumuylymb18358156.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lLs3GQtT1RI/UySWa0AB5vI/AAAAAAAAqWQ/S6zcV_gi3is/s1600/thumuylymb18358156.jpg\" height=\"340\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The closed MRI system helps\nyour doctor to see the small, subtle abnormalities in your brain that may be\ncausing your seizure activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The MEG test will take\nbetween 1 hour to 2 &nbsp;hours. During this\ntime, you will need to remain as still as possible, not moving your head. This\nis very important. If you need a break, to go for pee etc &nbsp;tell the technologist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epilepsy is more common\nin those with autism. &nbsp;Attention-deficit\nhyperactivity disorder affects three to five times more children with epilepsy\nthan children in the general population. &nbsp;ADHD and epilepsy have significant\nconsequences on a child's behavioral, learning, and social development.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At home the recommended\ninitial medication for seizure of a long duration is midazolam placed in the\nmouth. &nbsp;Diazepam suppository may also be\nused rectally for people who drool and cannot swallow . &nbsp;In hospital, intravenous\nlorazepam is preferred. <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">&nbsp;NEVER&nbsp; EVER do self medication.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Slowly stopping\nmedications may be reasonable in some people who do not have a seizure for two\nto four years; however, around a third of people have a recurrence, most often\nduring the first six months. Stopping is possible in about 70% of children and\n60% of adults.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One predictor of\nlong-term outcome is the number of seizures that occur in the first six months.\nThis is the time the mother of a small child must be careful. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Statistics have proved\nthat the risk of suicide is increased </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">about 3 times in those with epilepsy. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before 1970 the United\nKingdom had laws which prevented people with epilepsy from marrying. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The stigma may result\nin some people with epilepsy denying that they have ever had seizures, and many\nhusbands were held responsible for the young wife\u2019s suicide.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those with epilepsy are\nat about twice the risk of being involved in a motor vehicular collision and\nthus in many areas of the world are not allowed to drive or only able to drive\nif certain conditions are met. Many countries require one to three years without\nseizures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like I said before , a\nseizure is a massive disruption of electrical communication between neurons in\nthe brain, leading to the temporary release of excessive energy in a\nsynchronized form. Neurons communicate with each other by firing electrical\nimpulses. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These impulses travel\nfrom the neuron along the axon, and then stimulate the release of\nneurotransmitters which flow across the synaptic cleft (the gap between the\ncells) to the dendrites of the receiving cell.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If more excitatory than\ninhibitory transmitters are released, the cell will fire- if more inhibitory </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">neurotransmitters are released, the cell will not fire. Since large numbers of\ncells are involved in even simple actions, the on/off action serves to control\nphysical and mental functioning.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tgeT-euRx40/UySarcoLz4I/AAAAAAAAqWc/qgtpn46ukBA/s1600/dobreghewnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tgeT-euRx40/UySarcoLz4I/AAAAAAAAqWc/qgtpn46ukBA/s1600/dobreghewnload.jpg\" height=\"293\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, if there is a\nconsistently higher level of the excitory neurotransmitters, or too few\ninhibitory ones, the likelihood of a seizure\u2014an uncontrolled, continuing firing\nof neurons in the brain\u2014is increased. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RWshXGcA4yg/UySaxhIxohI/AAAAAAAAqWk/-ImZkOpXAtI/s1600/glutamnrjrate.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RWshXGcA4yg/UySaxhIxohI/AAAAAAAAqWk/-ImZkOpXAtI/s1600/glutamnrjrate.jpg\" height=\"269\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the newer medications relate\ndirectly to this process and are designed to increase the level of inhibitory\nneurotransmitters, especially gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA), or to decrease\nthe amount of the excitatory ones, such as glutamate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anything that\ninterrupts the normal connections between nerve cells in the brain can cause a\nseizure. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This includes a high\nfever, low blood sugar, high blood sugar, alcohol or drug withdrawal, or a\nbrain concussion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under these circumstances, anyone can have one\nor more seizures. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, when a person\nhas two or more unprovoked seizures, he is considered to have epilepsy.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala Lord Parashurama\ncreated thousands of Snake groves or Sarpakkavus. Inside these groves he cause\nAyurvedic creepers and trees ( for medicinal barks ) to be grown.&nbsp; During the British rule , they destroyed all\nthese groves stating superstition. There are tree barks for every disease on\nthis planet.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-size: large;\">My wife\u2019s paternal grandmother was an Ayurvedic physician at Kannur </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\">.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mQpTb2XzCd0/UyVMO1g0ijI/AAAAAAAAqW8/1nVc1z5znV4/s1600/3051640dj5i65067_8e9fd352dd_m.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mQpTb2XzCd0/UyVMO1g0ijI/AAAAAAAAqW8/1nVc1z5znV4/s1600/3051640dj5i65067_8e9fd352dd_m.jpg\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\">There\nis a creeper in Kannur by the name of Amritavalli ( leaves are heart shaped ) that bring\ndown sugar levels from 500 to less than 100 in a few of days\u2014and that too\npermanently, which means the pancreas is regenerated.. &nbsp;There is no medicine on this planet which is even 1/100th as effective.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">KING COBRA AND SNAKE\nTEMPLES OF KERALA VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>In the rush to run down\nHinduism, and convert Hindus to other religions\u2014this planet is suffering. &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>For\nthousands of years , the only medicines available to this planet was from\nKerala snake groves.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>Today everybody makes fun of Hindus for worshiping snakes.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Almost all our\nAyurvedic records were taken away to Germany by the Rothschild\u2019s Basel Mission\nfrom Calicut ( my home town ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
